name: Bad Boro
description: Ever imagine a Souls-like set in an early 2000’s cartoon world? Well, look no further: Explore the cartoony & dystopian city of Badlerboro with its unique districts, wacky citizens, and unforgiving enemies.

name: KMON: Genesis
description: Unleash your inner strategist in the ultimate turn-based RPG. Train, nurture, and evolve your Kryptomons to become the best trainer in the KMON Universe.

name: EchtegP
description:
EchtegP is platformer in Godot. Enjoy and keep track of future updates.
You can play with WASD or arrow keys and additionally space bar is for jumping.

name: Basalt Breaker
description: Basalt Breaker is a fresh, 3rd person, isometric take on a beloved puzzle game. Explore classic rooms, perfect your skills on replay-able daily puzzles, or try uniquely shaped custom floors. The perfect comfort game to play while queuing for a match or sitting through a tedious meeting.

name: Shadowvane
description: Shadowvane is a Soulslike MMO with a 1v1 PvP Arena, 5v5 Battlegrounds, and an Open World realm where players can interact and advance their character.

name: Panpu-ja
description: You control three employees of a cleaning company, carrying out their jobs, but be careful, as engaging in activities outside of work may lead to undesirable outcomes.

name: DraftyCar
description: DraftyCar is a fast-paced racing game simulating the art of professional stockcar drafting. Tweak the physics to your liking and immerse yourself in pursuit of victory. Strategically place your car to gain speed, disrupt your competition and navigate a high-speed drag race to the finish.

name: Green Zone
description: Earn points with central zones but watch out for wind. Try to get a high score before the minute timer runs out.

name: Animal Planner
description: Animal Planner is a satisfying sliding puzzle game, a game to make all animals happy!

name: Every Year Banjir
description: Survive a flood scenario in this animal-fantasy world depicted in an era where floods happen every year! Survive the harsh conditions of the random rainfalls and equip yourself with flood survival knowledge. Learn real world survival skills and make decisions that will save lives.

name: Royalevia
description: The game takes place in a dark and spooky forest where the player takes on the role of a dark knight, who must move through the treacherous terrain and fight the hordes of the undead that have risen from the dead.

name: Happy Wagon
description: A happy little game about the struggles of old-timey travelling.Happy Wagon features several difficulties, unlockable characters, an endless mode and achievements. Happy Travels!

name: Curse of the Shadow Samurai
description: Seek vengeance, battling hordes of enemies across multiple stages. Conquer challenging waves, obtain powerful upgrades, and face formidable bosses. Unleash retribution in this thrilling quest for justice!

name: Gun Jam VR
description: GUN JAM is a rhythm FPS where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. It features a unique beat-pattern shooting mechanic and firefights synced to the original soundtrack in a vibrant world. Prepare to obliterate enemies whilst blasting to the beat.

name: Per Aspera VR
description: Per Aspera VR is a unique narrative simulation & strategy game specially designed for VR. Take control of AMI, the galaxy’s most sophisticated AI, tasked with an important mission: Terraform Mars and make it a habitable planet. You decide the future — terraform, make crucial narrative decisions, manage resources, discover long-hidden secrets, and immerse yourself in a rich and compelling story.

name: Mind
description: Mind is a minimalistic puzzle game. Using 4 directions and an interactive environment, you need to navigate and reach the final square. Challenge your mind through 60 levels.

name: Putin Must Die: Defend the White House
description: Vladimir has gone mad. He has created an army of Russian-speaking Putin clones to destroy America, and the White House is the final frontier. You must defend the White House against invading hordes of Vladimir clones, or become one of them.

name: Hide n' Explode
description: The explosive multiplayer game where seekers blow up hiders while they desperately try to blend in with decoys. Expect chaos, laughter, and thrilling gameplay! Don't forget to use the built in proximity voice chat!

name: Supercar Driving Simulator
description: An open-world, exotic car driving simulator that features unique and realistic physics with car damage, retina graphics and traction control to help you control even the most powerful hypercars. You can choose from 4 radio stations to set the mood for driving.

name: Airport Trucks Car Parking Simulator
description: Ever wanted to be an Airport Driver? Now is your chance! Take the controls of 3 vital Airport Support Vehicles and pass your Driving Test at the Airport today!

name: GForce 2
description:
GFORCE 2 is a very fun game where your mission is to collect a certain amounts of diamonds or rescue people
in a hostile world with many obstacles.You can play it like a regular cave flyer with gravity or like a shooter with a joystick.
Tilt left or right your device to help water to find it's way, or use missile for make your way in the environment.
By default the game's difficulty is set to hard if it's too hard,change it to easy you will have a shield around your ship.

name: 5 A Side Legends
description: Start from the bottom of and lead your 5 a side team to eternal glory! 5 a side legends allows you to manage your very own 5 a side team with all the drama, excitement and banter of real life.

name: Maria Way
description:
Do you crave the limelight? Now with this new clicker simulator game you get a chance to become popular.
Maria Way, one of the most hyped vloggers, will take you through the whole process – from picking a topic for your video to growing your subscribers’ community!

name: God's Orbits
description:
God has been making planets and stars orbit around each other for billions of years. But as any normal person, He now needs a break. So, as God takes a week’s vacation and goes to Cancún, you need to replace Him and do His job.
The game is a gravity simulation based on Newton’s law of universal gravity where you control the speed and direction of a single planet. You’ll need to find the precise trajectory of this planet to make it orbit around another celestial body.
A lot of features are offered to diversify the different challenges at hand.

name: Air Hockey Championship
description: Discover this top free air hockey game with championship mode and amazing features!

name: Empire's Order
description:
Empire's Order is a unique sci-fi game that takes players on a journey on a distant planet in the galaxy where a precious ore is waiting to be mined. As the chosen one, it is up to you to settle on the planet, extract the ore, and deliver it to the Empire in a timely manner.
Players will have the ability to build their own deck, research new technologies, upgrade their equipment, trade with other players, and run operations with their agents. With a variety of gameplay options and the use of all means necessary to deliver the ore, Empire's Order offers an engaging and challenging rogue-lite incremental deck-building experience.
The game features 42 different cards, 37 different buildings, 33 events, and 84 achievements, as well as a variety of events, perks, and specializations to keep players engaged and challenged.

name: JigZone
description: JigZone - Jigsaw Puzzles provide hours of entertainment for you, your whole family and your friends. Give us a try and you'll never need to look for those missing pieces on the floor!
Build a chain of as many tiles as the number shown on the tile to explode the chain and get the score. Make a longer chain and get a higher score! Rotate the tiles for extra possibilities!

name: Rage of Blades
description:
Rage of Blades is a brutal and unforgiving online PvP action/fighting game that brings players to the heart of medieval combat. From the blood-soaked battlefields of Northern Arenas to the sun-baked Arenas of South, warriors from across the globe have come together to test their mettle in one-on-one duels that will leave only the strongest standing.
Choose your fighter from a cast of legendary warriors including Vikings, Knights, Assassins and more. Each warrior brings their own unique style and skills to the fray, challenging you to master new strategies and techniques as you fight your way to the top.

name: Word Search Explorer
description:
A new twist on the classic word search. Use your skills of deduction to uncover the letters that make up each word. Every word found gives you additional moves to work with. How many moves will it take you to solve each puzzle?
Collect animal friends along the way to assist you as you navigate this world of words. Each has a different power that will help you solve the puzzle and increase your score. Challenge your friends and the world with your best high scores on the leader-boards.

name: Warbirds P-51 Mustang ACE
description: Warbirds P-51 Mustang is a 3d WWII air combat game, a flight sim with accelerometer control, photo-realistic scene, and battle missions based on true history.

name: Bricks of Rome
description:
Rome was not built in a single day, that's for sure. It took many years and much effort to become the empire that we all know. Grab your sword and shield and put a small stone to build this empire.
The game "Bricks of Rome" is a mixture of arcade and strategy games. Move the plate in the bottom of the screen with your finger and chip the ball that is coming towards you and return it to the enemy ranks that consists of a series of blocks and other objects. The game's story takes place between 300 BC to 100 BC in the Mediterranean area and you can choose from a variety of states and nations of the era such as the Romans, the Kingdom of Macedonia, the Greek city-states, the Gallic tribes, the Carthaginians, the Epirus, the Seleucids, the Ptolemies, the Germanic tribes, the British tribes or the Kingdom of Pergamon. Through separate campaigns you will lead your people to victory and you will become the Supreme Ruler in the Mediterranean Sea. To achieve this, you will need to hire mercenaries or to upgrade your weapons and armor of your soldiers or build forts and palisades.

name: Flip It 2
description:
Are you ready to take the ultimate Flip Challenge! Flip It is one of the most challenging game you'll play all summer. Your goal is to go around different shapes and collect coins to complete each level. You will encounter many obstacles on your way to glory so keep your eyes open.
Use the coins you collect to unlock epic skins. Compete with your friends on the online leaderboards. There are two game modes arcade and endless mode. In the endless mode we will be giving you a new shape to master everyday. Compete with players around the globe to be on top and reign supreme.

name: The Unic
description:
Expand your patterns collection to generate colorful shapes compositions.
Capture duplicates, unveil The Unic, see how much you can reveal!
The Unic is an observation game which should thrill any pattern and design lover.
Whether you know what polka dots, tartan, argyle or gingham are, get ready to enjoy yourself in this fresh, highly colored and delicately crafted game!

name: Barcode Kingdom
description:
Scan barcodes, Get unique units and items!
Build your own kingdom.
The world named 'Barcodia' is comprised of the magical power of barcodes.
Barcodes in the real world is a magic circle that transmit the magical power from the real world to 'Barcodia'.
The barcodes around you will become your army.
Summon various units and items, and make the strongest army.
Share good barcodes and fight against the monsters with your friends.

name: The Ball Game: One Touch Arcade
description: Improve your concentration and patience with every game played. Excel your skills and better your score.

name: Galaxy Dwellers
description:
Here it is! Absolutely incredible sci-fi strategy game from authors of Tower Dwellers!
Choose from 3 powerful armies, lead your unique units, fight in epic battles and CONQUER THE SPACE!

name: Hypastorm
description: A fast, physics based, twin stick indie game. In a distant future, take your craft and enter the arena to shoot and bounce your way to victory and glory.

name: Compression HD
description:
Eliminate the blocks before the walls close in on you!
Mixing the classic gameplay style of traditional block dropping games, with a uniquely dynamic gaming surface, Compression creates an ever changing challenge for even the most advanced block dropping fan.

name: Nerd Blocks
description:
In an exciting game we combine words with passion for anime, movies, games, TV series and everything that is described as NERD!
Test yourself in remembering movie details or all the characters in your favorite series.

name: Pug Hop Mole Bop
description:
You must protect this yard!
It’s up to you **Gizmo Puddinkiss** to save the day. Bop and hop and make the moles go away!
Tap on your device to make Gizmo jump to the left or to the right. Hold left or right to make him sprint that direction. Land on top of the moles when they show their furry faces!

name: Needle Of Anger
description:
Caution! This game, please Want Please note that there is a frustration-induced and cancer induction.
This game is the perfect thread through that game to a simple person.
Success when you pass through the thin thread into the hole in the small needle!
However, please note the Tremor symptoms.
Side effects of this game, please note that there is a case in which frustrating is throw to explode.

name: Army of Frogs HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Bladesong
description: Crafting/management game Bladesong is set on taking swordmaking mechanics to a new level, featuring unparalleled customization of the sword's every detail and deep analysis of the sword's physical properties. Take the role of a swordsmith in the city of Eren Keep, one of mankind’s last standing cities after the gods have banished themselves in an act of desperation. Run your forge, fulfill customer commissions and perfect your craft and tools. Find your way in a city governed by an idolized ruler with an iron grip and build a loyal team of those you deem trustworthy.

name: Street Thugz
description: Traditional arcade action fighting game, restoring the punchy impact of STREETS OF RAGE. Like SHADOW FORCE, you can control any enemy and BOSS in the game and compete for the title of Final Fight King.

name: The Assailant's Arrival
description: Alternative Universe Game/Sci-Fi Game

name: Village & Monsters
description: Village & Monsters is a card game that challenges you to develop a human settlement as well as viruses. The settlement is periodically attacked by monsters, but the monster population is held back by a virus. The goal of the game is to reach a population of 100 people and not let the virus die.

name: Warp Gate World Kingdom Tales
description: This is a high degree of freedom single player battle chess game. You can pass the level by entering any teleportation gate within the level. You can save at the beginning of each round. The stronghold interface allows for job transfer.

name: Narcotics Police: Crime And Punish
description: It is a first -person (FPS) exploration game. You need to explore the map and collect various documents and items. Fight with dark power. The game contains a lot of information, you need to find the truth in this information and get the ending

name: Legend of Taigong
description: A relaxed casual repair fairy game, suitable for leisure time to open a light pigeon game. You can play as a disciple brought up by Jiang Ziya and experience the life of a practitioner without the aura of the main character in an overhead world.

name: Coded Soul: Uketsunagareshi Idea
description: Sin descripción

name: Cuber
description: You have to beat the game with platforms

name: Wishbind
description: A 2D platformer collect-a-thon in which you'll have to help someone collect a special kind of leaves to help them fulfill their project, while meeting interesting characters, overcoming tough platforming challenges and discovering secrets all throughout the world.

name: Bratavism
description: A solitary dolphin creature creates an abstract painting by throwing a tantrum!

name: Ozmafia!! 0 Reflexion
description: Upcoming game in the Ozmafia series. A demo released in 2017.

name: Untitled Tokyo Revengers Action RPG
description: A new 3D action RPG based on the popular manga and anime series Tokyo Revengers for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, PC (DMM Games), iOS, and Android. A specific title was not announced. It will launch as a free-to-play title with item-based microtransactions this winter in Japan.

name: Age of Time
description: Experimental networking game made to test the Torque Engine, the game focuses on small-server community dynamics in a classic fantasy RPG world. While mostly a personal project, the server continues to run today and players can partake in community driven features like crowd-sourced policing and fair-air bartering.

name: Nomad
description: Nomad is a sandbox survival game. Hunt, craft, kill and survive! Find food, drink, weapons, ammo and medical supplies - or craft them! Build a base to protect yourself but also remember to protect the base from raiding players.

name: Mega Man X: The Red Cartridge
description: The creepypasta game was written by FoxySonicMaster108

name: Subátor
description: In the game, the main character Subátor must defeat a pencil sharpener that is upset. The story culminates in a duel on the refrigerator, which one needs to reach by jumping on crayons. Subátor is inspired by a little robot at the streamer fluffcz's.

name: Our Story in Spring
description:
Hana is a shy florist with a secret wish: to reinvent herself and experience more beyond life in the blossom-bathed village of Yamamori. There's just one small problem— hopelessly sheltered, she has never stepped foot outside the boundaries of the village before.

Meanwhile, those around Hana have flourished. Her best friend chased his dreams to the big city, and even her childhood bully returns to Yamamori a reformed man. Determined to be left behind no more, Hana steels her resolve, but it will take friendship, love, and more than a little courage to change on her own.

Drift across three tranquil springs in rural and urban Japan, and experience the tender tale of one young woman's budding desire to transform her future alongside the men who shaped her past.

name: Farcana
description:
Farcana is a third-person team ability shooter set in a mesmerizing Sci-Fi landscape. With its cutting-edge Unreal Engine 5 graphics, Farcana transports you to the awe-inspiring colonized Mars, where you will engage in heart-pounding 4x4 PvP combat matches across various game modes.

At its core, Farcana is a blend of gripping gameplay and eSports focus. Both players and spectators are bound to be drawn into its dynamic blend of action, strategy, and skill. Moreover, Farcana stands out with its innovative Bitcoin-backed prize system. Whether it's through cash boxes or tournament prizes, Farcana recognizes and rewards your dedication and prowess.

name: Midnight Heist
description: Sin descripción

name: Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours
description: A 2D, turned-based, story driven action RPG.

name: Hell of Nightmares: Chapter 1
description: You have to escape Miss Roseville's school by solving puzzles

name: Ourworld
description: Ourworld is a 1:1 global flight simulator. You'll battle awakened A.I.s, safeguarding our world. It features 3D city modeling, multiplayer online gaming. Deluxe version include all aircraft and features.

name: Trepang2: Banger Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pegasus Expedition: Grand Admiral Edition
description: A convenient bundle for fans of The Pegasus Expedition, combining the game, digital artbook and digital soundtrack in one handy package. Available to complete your set even if you already own some of the contents!

name: Bubble Melody
description:
Chillax with bubble popping mayhem!
Save the Mega Cute Miximals from their bubble prisons while you enjoy a bubble popping bonaza. Whatever you do don’t pop Boomskull’s bubble or let any of the other bubbles escape!
Can you survive the bubble waves and rack up the highest score?

name: Escape! Skeleton.J
description:
Here is a little monster.
He likes collecting special goodies from human village.
However, he did not know what disaster his childish hobby would bring about.
Taking the role of the little monster, player will sneak into the village, avoid the villagers, and collect as many "goodies" as possible!

name: War Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Machine Phantasm
description: A medium paced Waves / Arena shooter in VR

name: Colorspace
description:
Colorspace is a fast paced singleplayer racing game where you have to destroy obstacles by changing to the right color. Set in a neon minimalist environement, you must clear the levels as fast as possible to restore the communication signal.
The best part is you don't have breaks!

name: Spitter Man vs. The Pooping Birds
description: Protect the city from the Poopings Bird !

name: The Silver Bullet
description:
Kali, the legendary "Goddess of Death" in the South America Revolution.
She joined Neverlight, the counter-demon organization, after some kind of incident.
She wield two pistols that carve silver on bullets became a secret agent who hunts down demons.
Kali was investigating a strange case occurred in the Axis-21 Marine Research Plant
when she discovers the large and shadowy conspiracy of failed Project Prometheus.

name: Lightning Duru
description: Lightning Duru is a classic 2D shooting game. Players will control two airships from “X War Office” to eliminate the enemies encountered in different missions.

name: Tap To Jump On Time 3D
description:
It is a game in which the ball jumps to avoid colliding with other colored balls.
To jump, just tap the screen before colliding with the ball.
Let's start with who is the best.

name: Emergency HD
description: Command fire brigades, rescue services and police forces in a rescue strategy game with realistic graphics! Fight against fires, save lives and eliminate terrorists - in 14 elaborate missions!

name: Car Rush I
description:
Car Rush is a simple driving game. Avoid other cars, and survive as long as possible.
Also do not forget to watch the fuel gauge. When make it run out of fuel, the game is over.

name: Turtle Rush
description:
Easy! Fun! Turtle Rush!
When turtle is on rush, just break everything.
Easy and Fun! Relieve your Stress with your Turtle.

name: Danger Drop
description: Defy gravity, conquer challenges, and reach new heights in this thrilling platformer. Do you have what it takes? Can you overcome the trials, avoid deadly falls, and prove your platforming prowess?

name: Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers
description: A cancelled DS port of Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers.

name: Cut It: Brain Puzzles
description: Simple puzzle game where you cut shapes in order to collect stars.

name: Garden Dreams
description: Click around the garden to perform various jobs, like watering plants, picking produce and unleashing pesticides.

name: Samosa: Runner Gunner
description:
Sam is an auto driver who lives happily with his pet chicken.
Osa is an evil scientist who wants to conquer the whole world for his own experiments.
When they both come face to face, it is going to be one epic showdown.
Play as Sam the auto driver and shoot at waves of Osa's minions. Its a fast paced auto runner shooter where you come against plenty of various enemies. The Auto you ride comes with some handy spells which when used correctly can be the difference between dying at the hands of the robots or burning them to the ground. When you think those minions are easy , the bosses wont let you through without a big fight.

name: Pinata Punishers: Idle Clicker
description: Celebrate the Piñata Carnival with all the townsfolk in this fun and wacky idle clicker game where you bash as many piñatas as you can, collect hoards of candy and punish evil piñatas before they destroy the carnival!

name: Love or Passion
description: This interactive story love game will have you hooked up on reading! Great news for story lovers! The best romance story love game is finally out. Don’t miss your chance to download it and enjoy reading captivating chapters of Love or Passion - Love Game Romance Teen Story Game.

name: My Pocket Arcade
description: A nostalgic ticket-redemption arcade featuring all of your favorite games. Win tickets and use them to buy awesome virtual prizes at the Prize Wall.

name: Doodle Truck
description: You are a busy truck driver. every day, it's up to you to deliver important payloads to their various destinations.

name: Zombie Smash Racer
description: In Zombie Smash Racer you control a tank on the insane speed, blowing up everything on your way and smashing zombies coming to you. This game puts you two tasks: to kill as many zombies as you can and survive as long as possible without crashing. When you collides with counter obstacles you'll lose health, so you need to go around or destroy them to survive. Using GameCenter leaderboards, you can compete with your friends!

name: TankHero
description: Tank Hero is a third-person 3D game. This game requires players to operate a tank to eliminate enemies along the way and advance to the end in a complex road environment. Facing different environments, choose the right tank to start the challenge!

name: Tero: Terror Hour
description: Your mother didn't let you watch TV at night... and even after her death, she still won't let you... Don't let her catch you watching that damn horror movie you just bought... Cover yourself with the blanket!

name: Birds & Bombs
description: Wicked ghosts have kidnapped the president’s daughter, trapping her in a haunted mansion! As a plucky young bird trooper you must use your bomb-throwing abilities to defeat the ghosts and rescue the girl. Ghosts can only be destroyed by throwing bombs into their mouths. Use the stylus to set your throwing angle and take your best shot! Bounce bombs off walls and eerie floating furniture to defeat all the spooks in each stage, but make sure not to run out of bombs or you're in for a fright! In addition to the main Story Mode, you can really put your skills to the test in Challenge Mode with only a limited number of bombs to last you through to the end. But never fear; with perseverance and accuracy, you're sure to replenish your supply and stay in high spirits!

name: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Lion War of the Lions
description: Developed by passionate Final Fantasy Tactics fans, Final Fantasy Tactics: The Lion War of the Lions is a tactical role-playing game that serves as an enhanced, 'definitive' port of the original Final Fantasy Tactics, incorporating content from its official remakes. It is an enhanced follow-up to their original hack, Final Fantasy Tactics: The Lion War.

name: Target Party
description:
Welcome to Target Party, the first-person platform game that will make you feel the adrenaline of speed and the art of speedrunning! Face a fast-paced challenge as you dash through action-packed, thrilling levels with only one goal in mind: destroy all the targets before you reach the finish line, and do it at full speed!
Explore different strategies and routes, perfect your jumps and spins, and discover hidden shortcuts as you dive into the challenging world of Target Party. Master the mechanics and compete with players from around the world in online leaderboards to prove who is the true king of the party.
Join the party and discover why Target Party is the first-person platformer that will keep you glued to the screen, enjoying dizzying thrills with every jump, every shot and every second it takes to reach victory!

name: Hide and Seek 2: Story of Demian
description: Main character, Gwyn Demian, heard news that there is treasure in a residence that shut down a few years back. But there was the shadow of death. The more he tried to live, the more drastic things became for him. Which choice does he choose?

name: The Yakuza Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Plane
description: "Paper Plane" is a retro style 2D shooting game with high difficulty. Graphics drawn mostly by Office Excel and sound FX made by the author's mouth.

name: Mysterious Place
description: Design: In this game, players will step into the world of a Mysterious Place. Navigate the enigmatic landscapes and make crucial decisions. With pixel graphics and high-quality animations, immerse yourself in a visually stunning and atmospheric experience. Available in Russian and English.

name: Gun to the Zone
description: Find powerful weapons, fight monsters and discover the secrets of the Zone. Each weapon is different.

name: JungleRing2D
description: Jungle Ring is a fun and exciting game,that improves and trainning your reaction.The game is based on your concentration and reaction.How good is your reaction,you can test in this game?Would be you able to pass all levels?

name: Brave Little Beasties
description: Raise your elemental beasties to become the strongest fighter in the arena. Collect them in wild areas and train them to fight in battles against other players. Crossbreed them to change their element. Sell beasties that you no longer need to other players and try to complete your beastie collection.

name: Goosebumps Ghouls Slime Slinger
description: A gallery shooter game featured on the Scholastic website.

name: Open Flower
description: A visual novel about a small Japanese family. Just moved to a big city full of surprises and adult adventures.

name: Hata Kokoro Danmarku-ren

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines II - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines II - Day 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Balance Board
description:
Hello. How's your balance...
Touch either side of screen to rotate the platform board, keep the ball from falling off. Double Tap and hold for faster rotations.
Hit the star coins with the ball to score points, get highest points then pat yourself on the back.. Congrats champ !

name: Infinity Loop: Blueprints
description:
Infinity Loop game is extremely simple, easy to learn puzzle game. Dive into relaxing world of immersive challenges!
Infinity Loops Blueprint is relaxing puzzle game in which you rotate pieces to render them into loop.
Discover infinite mysterious combinations and achieve perfect harmony. Craft your own zen garden mixing infinite loop symbols and blueprint style simplicity and fashion.

name: ShortCircuit
description: The classic Mac game now on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. ShortCircuit is an action puzzle game where you must remove tiles by connecting two matching tiles with no more than three lines.

name: HolidayVille
description:
Lets play to build your own village with lots of fantasy houses, shops, decorations, christmas trees, snowman and wonders.
Welcome to HolidayVille where you can create your dream village based on your imagination using vast number of resources. You can build houses for your citizens, decorations, community buildings and shops so that you can earn money serving your citizens. Grow crops from your crop fields and supply on business to earn money. Make a wonderful place to live for your citizens using a vast number of buildings & architectures.

name: Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens
description:
Sequel to the smash hit Home Sweet Home! Now you'll be designing Kitchens that will take your client's breath away!
Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens will give you the chance to unleash your hidden talents as an Interior Designer. You choose the furniture, patterns, and colors to create a masterpiece that will blow your client away.
With simple controls, a fun graphical style, and an easy to use interface, Home Sweet Home 2 allows you to nurture your creative side. Remember, a house is not a home until it is a Home Sweet Home!

name: Pair
description: A modern and definitely different gaming experience.

name: Animals & Fairy Tales Puzzles
description:
The perfect puzzle collection for boys and girls with exclusive high-quality graphics and illustrations. It has everything a kid wants to play with.

This educational puzzle game builds your child's perception, fine motor skills and logical thinking while your child is having a lot of fun!
The difficulty level can be adjusted individually. The app is suitable for toddlers as well as for preschool children! Your child will play the puzzle app for a long time and enjoy it, as there is always a new arrangement of the puzzle pieces.

name: Tanked!
description:
Come and join the tank revolution and climb the ladder to become the best tank commander around!
Play with your friends and see who can kill the most tanks. Upgrade your tank with the best upgrades to defeat the enemy tanks faster. Add on the coolest mods from mines to plant around the map to make it hard for enemy tanks to get around, stealth-mode packs to hide away from enemy tanks and to sneak up on them, machine guns to shoot down the enemy tank fast, and many more to come.
With all these upgrades and mods you should be the best tank commander out there and you will be able to dominate the tank field.

name: Nations Cup Cricket 2019
description:
Nations Cup Cricket 2019 is the follow up to last year's fan favourite Village Cricket, and allows you to bat and bowl your way across the cricketing world in pursuit of glory! Did you miss out on tickets to the World Cup? Then play this instead!
Take on 50 teams from as far and wide as the Philippines, Bermuda, Kenya, India, and greatest-team-in-the-world England. Laugh as you beat some blokes from Australia trying to cheat their way to the top!

name: Playbook: Stories with Choices
description: You will get compelling interactive stories about the supernatural, betrayal, love, and friendship which will take you to many different endings. Make decisions that really matter and along the way, find hidden objects, assemble torn pictures, look for differences between pictures, or pick a lock to open the secret drawer. The best collection of story games with choices is waiting for you! Download Playbook: Interactive Story Games today and enjoy a storytelling masterpiece.

name: Beat Boss
description: Ever get tired of listening to your boss at work? Ever get so mad you wish you could punch him silly? Well, now you CAN with this fun game Beat Your Boss! It's been a long day, you're ready to go home, and this guy just won't leave you alone! So take your aggressions out on the boss and don't actually get fired from your job!

name: Popstar
description: Once you pop, you can't stop!

name: Sushi Mushi
description: Love to play with your food?...

name: Joy Desk
description:
The Joy Desk app is the fun, quirky, new game that actually tests your smarts!
The app recreates those boring memo pads you get at work but you won’t be reading these pads! Memo pads have items and objects on them for you to play with – lines, balls, and stars.
The object of the game is to use your ball and get all the stars. Turn, move, rotate the memo pads and the ball will fall to catch the stars. Collect all the stars and to move through the levels.
Sounds easy, right? Well, Joy Desk is for only the smartest players.
Lines create restrictions, forcing players to think about where they will move the memo pads to collect the stars all at once.
Levels get progressively more difficult, forcing players to be thoughtful.
Joy Desk also comes with pass cards so if you’re unsure of how to solve the puzzles, then use the pass cards to get past the more difficult puzzle levels.
Pass cards are super helpful in a clinch - use them when you feel stumped!
You get 5 free keys to open a walkthrough of each level.
After you used up all the free keys, you can buy them through in-app purchasing.
What if you used up all the free keys and you don't have enough money to buy one?
Then the bonus game will solve you problem. If you win the game, you get one bonus key!!

name: Crazy Golf Arcade Game
description:
Crazy Golf is a cool mini golf game , mix between Golf ball and arcade classic.
Drive the ball through goals in a fast paced physic based environment.

name: Castle Burn
description:
Welcome to Castle Burn, the mobile fantasy RTS game with competitive PvP battles!
Fire Pillars, Cannon Towers, Vikings, Dragons, use whatever you want to fight alongside great Heroes to burn down your enemy's castle!

name: FPS Commando Gun Shooting Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Popteenies Surprise
description: Sin descripción

name: Gt-r Car Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Urban Cars Sim
description: Sin descripción

name: Offroad G-Class
description: Sin descripción

name: Tower Color
description: Sin descripción

name: Tales & Dragons: Merge Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: CyberWave Survivor
description:
CyberWave Survivor, the survival space shooter with minimalistic gameplay and tough choices through ship upgrades!!
Defend the cyber planets from waves of enemy ships, Shmup style!! Tracking missiles, boss ships and more..
Every wave ends which allows for decisions for upgrading the ship, if currency allows..

name: War General: Multiplayer Rank
description:
Lead your troops to victory in epic battles against opponents in "War General - Multiplayer Rank"! As a war general, you'll need to strategize and plan your attacks carefully to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.
With a variety of soldiers, weapons, and military vehicles at your disposal, you can customize your army to suit your playstyle and take on any challenge that comes your way. Choose your spawning position and deploy your troops across the battlefield, taking down enemy soldiers, towers, and walls while protecting your own base from attack.
Each victory earns you in-game currency that you can use to upgrade your soldiers and equipment, making them even more powerful for your next battle. But that's not all – winning games also earns you rank points that can help you climb the ranks and earn even greater rewards!

name: Bright Reappear
description:
On the continent of Oslo, humans and creatures live peaceful and tranquil lives. Peace has lasted for thousands of years here. Immersed in peace, humans and creatures gradually forget the existence of darkness. And darkness quietly spreads.
The dark queen, once defeated by humans, has returned, leading a large army of darkness from the depths of hell to reappear in the world. The even more powerful darkness is invincible, and the northern human army has already been defeated, with the city defense lost. The dark army has moved south and is about to occupy the entire Oslo continent.
The belated humans and creatures rise up to fight back, but is there still a chance? Currently, the Oslo continent has been shrouded in darkness. Will light ever return?
This is a role-playing (RPG) game. As a player, you play as a hero fighting for the light of the Oslo continent. Okay! This is a classic story of a hero saving the world. But everyone has a dream of becoming a hero in their heart, and I hope you can experience it here.
Let's fight for the light together!

name: Mayority
description:
Hey, cool news! The elections are over and you are the new mayor of Mayority! But this is just the beginning of your success story. The residents of Mayority all have different ideas about what their perfect city should look like. Your challenge is to consider all their needs and make decisions that are fair for everyone. Are you ready for this task? Then let's get started!
With Mayority, you will experience what happens when things are not fair. Residents become angry, they protest, and when they are totally frustrated, they leave the city. This causes the city to lose tax revenue and you lose voters.

name: War 2: Victory
description: Based on the hit WAR2 browser game with 3,000,000 monthly active users across multiple platforms, the FREE MMO strategy game War 2 Victory now lands on App Store. Seek honor and glory in the battlefields of WWII. Take charge of either Allied or Axis forces and build a lone outpost into a mighty war machine.

name: Block and Save
description:
In this game, your goal is simple : Drag and move your polygons/circles, protect the targets from being knocked out by computer!
You need to win to unlock next stage. Besides winning, you may also target to get more scores : increase the time elapsed at the game, let computer's polygons/circles rush out of arena, or keep your polygons/circles on arena safely!

name: Def Leppard: Let's Rock It!
description:
Welcome to Def Leppard's "Let’s Rock It!" - Step into the shoes of Bethany, an up-and-coming rocker on the rise to stardom with the help of the legendary Def Leppard.
Collect stylish clothes and new musical instruments, conquer social media, and make your way to the top of the charts as you progress through levels & solve puzzles using match-3 combinations!

name: Word Whisper
description:
Word Whisper is a New Word Puzzle,Word Finder,Spelling game. Where you have to Swipe Letters and Pictures to complete words, challenge your self and complete Inspirational Quotes about Life,Weird Facts and Trivia .
It is a brain teaser and at the same time educational.
For hint you can check the pop up text to see which words needs to be filled to complete the text.

name: Topic Twister
description:
Make the twister spin to get a letter! You'll have 60 seconds to find a word for each of the 5 categories.
From the creators of Trivia Crack and Aworded Crack, a mobile version of the classic game is now here for your entertainment. Think on your feet and be quick to respond to win. Play games, win rewards and challenge the community.

name: Reverie
description: Can emptiness be an object? Reverie is a narrative-driven puzzle platformer about manipulating empty space. Grab and move empty space to solve puzzles in interesting ways!

name: Decurse: A New Magic Farming Game
description: Journey to a magical sparkly island where pandas, wizards, mermaids are just the beginning! Can you reverse the curse with the power of smiles and rainbows to bring happiness to the villagers?

name: The Rainbowers
description: The Rainbowers is a funny and challenging puzzle game about a cute little monster Family who inhabited the Rainbow Valley and feasted upon delicious color drops, oozing from the glorious Rainbow. One day furious tornado came and destroyed the Rainbow and scattered its drops all over the valley.

name: Knight Girl: Match 3 Puzzle
description:
The Knight Girl is a match-3 puzzle game from the developers of popular Tap the Frog series.
On your way, you will meet colorful characters that will share with you their secrets of happiness. Various game bonuses and features allow for a fresh look at the classic match-3 gameplay.

name: Such Ninja
description: Such Ninja is a relentless runner. Master the art of the ninja by dodging an endless storm of shurikens.

name: Fall of Porcupine: Save the World Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Z Line
description: Swipe your finger left or right to move the spaceship and stay inside the vortex while you fly throughout the space.

name: Loopy Blocks
description:
Only 99 cents for a limited amount of time.
34 levels, and an estimated 2 1/2 hours of gameplay.
Huge updates every month or so, doubling, even tripling gameplay!

name: Grapple Gum
description: Grapple Gum is an award winning SlingShot-Action-Platformer in which you play as a little pink piece of gum and grapple across moving objects. It's a neat mix of mechanics as you can float through the space, hitch a ride by hooking on the various platforms, and slingshot your way from one piece to another while also shooting at all kinds of targets, including big bosses and the little various sooty critters nibbling at your toes.

name: Revolt Legion VR
description: The game story is set in a country with an authoritarian government, where the people are oppressed. As a general of the country, in order to save the people, you chose an uprising, started arming yourself, formed a team, and liberated one city after another.

name: Xmas Boom
description:
Fulfillment of all wishes in the New Year!
A very angry witch Gruzona does not like Christmas. On the eve of it, witch turned all the gifts in malicious green monsters and now no one will receive gifts for Christmas. Santa's team of helpers moves forward to remove the spell all the presents before Christmas. Just hurry up, we need your help...

name: Resident Evil Revelations 2 - Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Gramik Paint Roller
description: Sin descripción

name: Blur 2
description: Blur 2 was a planned sequel to Blur. The game was cancelled due to Bizarre Creations' closure in February 2011. Three prototypes have been dumped, dated August 31, November 9, and November 10, 2010.

name: Jolly 4
description:
The final chapter of the JOLLY series. You have been tasked to work in a facility to guard a rebranded version of the beloved animatronics of Jolly Entertainment. However, you aren’t just here for the paycheck. You have a greater purpose here…stay the course.
One goal, four ways to end it.

name: Crixus: Life of free Gladiator
description: Crixus is a single-player life simulator, Ludus manager, and a hack-and-slash game based in ancient Rome. You are Gladiator and Ludus Manager. Fight in the arena, manage your gladiator school and roam the fictional city. Win tournaments and become the most famous Ludus.

name: Mech Arena
description:
Mech Arena is a fast-paced PvP mech shooter with competitive mayhem for everyone.

Choose from dozens of Weapons and Mechs with special abilities for endless combinations. Fight with friends or compete in a global arena of players, maps, and modes.

Take on the world in the most explosive, fun, and chaotic sport the future has to offer

name: Super Mario Fallen Stars
description:
Super Mario Fallen Stars is a demo made by Skillux which was never completed. The game features four colorful levels and 45 stars.

All three Cap Switches are sitting out in the open in the overworld. The Toad in the overworld refers to Bowser's Ice Mountain as "Bowser's Lair" but Bowser does not make an appearance in this game.

name: CoopValor 2056: All Unlimited Edition
description: Unlock the entire game, you will have no limitations of any kind. All novelties will be unlimited and forever!

name: Mall of Mayhem: All Skins Pack
description: Suit up for more mayhem with all of the skins in the game!

name: Evalina The Sorceress
description: Evalina is a dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Eternights: Deluxe Edition
description: Immerse yourself into the world of Eternights with the Deluxe Edition, including the base game, the official digital artbook, revealing insights into the development of Eternights, and the official digital soundtrack featuring over 30 tracks composed by Spencer Bambrick.

name: Dr. Virus
description: Dr. Virus is a captivating puzzle game where players must strategically arrange colored viruses to create chains and eliminate them from the board. With challenging levels and addictive gameplay, it offers a thrilling experience of virus-busting fun.

name: Scribble It!: Premium Edition
description:
This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!

- All word packages from our amazing community can be used in private lobbies,
- All event game modes can be played in private lobbies with your friends.
- Unlocks 30 new avatars.
- Unlocks 5 new theme colors

name: Venatur
description: Venatur is a Online PVPVE first person shooter, extract and survive, loot valuable items, craft better equipment, complete 3 story lines quests.

name: Karryn's Prison: Gym Trainer Side Job
description: The Gym, the final sanctuary where inmates can just be men, and workout in peace, free from any other desires or wants. That is, until a certain purple hair Chief Warden decides to turn the table.

name: King of Silence
description: Every noise has a consequence you don't want to know about. Hold your breath and immerse yourself in King Of Silence, a 1st person horrific experience where the strange, the superstitious and the frightening are combined.

name: Puzzle Time: Seasons
description: Immerse yourself in the world of nature and solve puzzles with captivating images of different seasons. Discover the beauty of mountains, forests, seas, and beaches in each season of the year.

name: Secret Agent No. 6
description: A first-person retro shooter with psychological horror elements. Discover various worldwide locations, enemies, weapons, and more. All while trying to uncover the plans of a secret terrorist organization while nothing is as it seems. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth?

name: Sex Coach: Hot Yoga
description: "Sex Coach: Hot Yoga" is an engaging, adult-only visual novel that invites players into an immersive world of sensuality, understanding, and self-discovery.

name: Yokai Art: Survival
description: By accident, you broke the seal of the mysterious book, which contains an enormous magical power that allows users to control any Yokai by defeating them and recording their names. This godly power is too much which alerts all the Yokai. You must find your own way to defeat them and survive.

name: A Birthday Present
description: You have been preparing this gift for a long time, and now you will embark on a journey to deliver it to your friends. On this long journey, you will encounter many interesting things.

name: Alaric's Quest
description: Alaric's Quest: Charming 2D platform game with a medieval theme and high difficulty level. Available on Linux, Windows, and SteamDeck, compatible with keyboard, controller, and touchscreen

name: Alien Breeding Program: First Contact
description: When an Alien ship appears above Earth, the world is thrown into chaos. Humanity, stunned to learn it is not alone in the universe, is quickly defeated by the technologically advanced Aliens. Among the chaos that follows, a woman named Natalie tries to find answers.

name: Anamnesis
description: Anamnesis is a psychological horror game with a heavy focus on tension, you'll never feel truly alone as you explore the vast darkness of the office. Relive a digitized memory of a power cut, with nothing but a box of matches for protection.

name: The Gun is Good
description: An action roguelike top-down shooter. Bullet heaven vs bullet hell, man against demon hordes. Loot countless powerful guns to annihilate your foes by the thousands, and use the power of runes to get even stronger. Trapped in an infinite spanning astral plane filled with innumerable hordes of murderous demons stalking your every move - things clearly aren't looking great. But, at least The Gun is Good. Traverse strange dimensions, battle increasingly powerful and numerous foes in ever changing environments to try to find a way back home.

name: Apes At Sea
description: Trapped in a mysterios sea full of monkeys. Try and collect bananas to buy upgrades from shopkeepers in the world. Sink ships and defeat bosses for bananas and powerups.

name: Arm of Satan: Co-op Precision Platformer
description: ARM OF SATAN is a tough precision platformer that carries the torch from the likes of Ori and Celeste, and sets it ablaze with a passion for co-op games. Featuring kick ass visuals influenced by the Hellboy comics, arcade-inspired gameplay, and a captivating narrative.

name: At the Dream End 2: Beyond Gods
description: How does one confront the unfathomable horror of knowing too much, of peering into the abyss and finding a reflection of their own insignificance? Horror sci-fi visual novel/choose your own adventure game with tons of lore and intriguing concepts about the universe, bio-experiments, and life itself.

name: Barely Working
description: Try to get your work done while being the office slut.

name: Bid War: Auction Simulator Storage Hunter
description: Welcome to the world of auctions, where every lot hides secrets and unexpected surprises! Are you ready to take a risk? Become a true professional, as the competition can be ruthless. Feel the adrenaline of battling for the most valuable and rare items, and become the king of auctions!

name: Bindmancer
description: Explore a randomized dungeon filled with NSFW perils to escape, traps to trip, prisoners to free, and evil-doers to defeat and punish! All in the quest to free your friends from deviously kinky fates!

name: Box Dungeons
description: Box Dungeons is a captivating puzzle game that draws inspiration from classic tabletop RPGs like Dungeons & Dragons and turn-based dungeon crawlers. Immerse yourself in a world of challenging puzzles and strategic gameplay as you navigate through intricate rooms filled with enemies and treasures.

name: BugWorld
description: Collect the energy of the flying saucer, start the agency, and explore the world.

name: CarLife Simulator
description: CarLife Simulator is a realistic car driving simulator with fun and challenges for the driver. Ideal for learning how to drive a car in different conditions, off-road cities, racing tracks for every taste, all this is available in CarLife Simulator.

name: Chambers
description: Live through your most dare Wild West fantasies in First Person Hellyeah-Em-Up format

name: Checkmate! My Shogi Club President can't be this Cute!
description: Have you ever wanted to learn how to play shogi (Japanese chess), but found the pieces intimidating? Fear no more! We're here to help. Experience a shogi game with a gentle learning curve, featuring westernized tiles, combined with an engaging visual novel. Join us and bid farewell to your worries!

name: Chef Capybara
description: Chef Capybara is a hardcore platformer where you play as a capybara cooking a variety of dishes. Explore different worlds, collect ingredients, and avoid traps while preparing meals. Unlock new outfits by collecting gems. Get ready for an exciting culinary adventure!

name: Chelesste
description: Embark on an epic journey where chess meets magic and digital card games in Chelesste! Engage in battles on a mystical chessboard as you command powerful cards. Strategize and outwit your opponents in this thrilling blend of strategy, card gameplay, and chess-inspired tactics.

name: Conludus
description: Conludus is an interactive learning system that uses gamification to make studying information technology fun and engaging. The system has 3 game modes, a quest. Conludus is actively expanding to provide fun learning in different topics. Try Conludus today and take your IT skills to the next level!

name: Completely Fictional Story About a City Inside a Whale
description: Ride the wind-up boat and explore Whaleville - a bizarre city inside the whale. Meet the locals, help them, and find your way out of the city.

name: Clock Ticker
description: Control the flow of time in this mysterious idle game. Buy upgrades to make the clock turn faster.

name: Cuckoo Mask
description: A Eroge visual novel game visual novel by smut artist Hasselnut- in Cuckoo Mask you're the biggest bulliable bottom in a masked party! With 5 character routes and one true ending, you will explore different kinds of domination.

name: Dildo Catcher
description: Dildo Catcher is a fascinating and colorful video game starring the charming Sofia. Her greatest passion is big dildos, which she is always eager to catch with her pussy and use to achieve incredible sensations.

name: Desert Spirit Grave
description: Desert Spirit Grave is an adventure game through desert and time. Grab your grappling hook and swing trough the stages of ruin. Find the secrets hidden in the runes!

name: Enchantment Siege
description: A chill defender game which you will fight enemies with magic. Beat the enemies and see how far you can go.

name: Dungeon Journey
description: Dungeon Journey is a dungeon-themed endless runner game featuring obstacle jumping and slime combat in a highly minimalist design.

name: Ensol
description: Explore and fight your way through an unknown solarpunk environment in this 3D isometric RPG. Uncover secrets as you go, encounter new enemies, and acquire upgrades from fallen foes.

name: Felicat’s Urban Odyssey
description: Felicat's Urban Odyssey is a hidden object where players explore city environments to find cats and Felicat, players will have a blast exploring the city and discovering new feline friends, and is sure to be a hit with cat lovers. Join the adventure and discover new feline friends in this journey!

name: Fate Collectors
description: Transform into a magical girl in this RPG experience! Find and recruit your teammates, defeat corrupted humans, and save the world from ultimate despair! Controls: Z/Left click = Select X/Right click = Cancel Arrow Keys/Left click = Movement

name: Farmer Simulator
description: You have just inherited from your uncle a small farm on the island of Rhodes in ancient Greece, part of the Roman Empire. The year is 113 AD. Build your farm, trade, buy new land and get rich. Become a respected citizen of the island.

name: Falling Tower
description: Falling Tower - a top-down game where you need to get out of each floor of the tower in time, destroying the monsters and dodging the falling stones of the wall.

name: ExtermiHate
description: ExtermiHate is a top down twin stick shooter action rogue-lite where you play as Raven "Luna" Ticke. She is a lone prisoner-turned-soldier send in to reclaim Earth 2 from a bug invasion. Fight your way through random levels and level up your character to survive the waves and defeat the bosses.

name: Fred's Cereal Company
description: Step into a chaotic cereal company gone wrong. Your resignation is ready, your decision firm, but your boss won't let you leave. Encounter strange characters, fight colleagues, solve puzzles, and face unexpected challenges as you strive to quit.

name: Folly Of The Wizards
description: Folly Of The Wizards is a comedic 2D roguelike action game that puts you in the shoes of a clumsy wizard apprentice. Join a wacky wizard cult and use unique spells to defeat enemies, explore procedurally generated dungeons, and save the world from chaos.

name: Fibula
description: A medieval fantasy multiplayer RPG exploration game. Master the arcane arts or farm turnips until you want to email the devs about how farming turnips could be better.

name: Fifi's Fortunes: Reclamation
description: FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation is a bullet hell game inspired by classic PC-98 video games. Test your reflexes like never before, as you fight to retrieve FiFi's mother's lost gemstones!

name: Goldilock One: The Mists of Jakaíra
description: You have just been exiled as a doomed criminal to the cold and dark side of the planet Goldilock One. An Open World to explore in a Co-op Action RPG with Local Multiplayer mixing survival elements with hack and slash, strategic combats, and a Party System based on forging alliances with NPCs.

name: GoldenMiner
description: This is a puzzle game. In this game, gold coins can be obtained through "mining".

name: Gregor's Notebook
description: The game offers players an exciting gaming experience with its rich graphics, impressive music, and immersive storyline. Gregor's Notebook is the story of a brave hero who saves the dark world, and players will follow in his footsteps as they play.

name: Hakou Watcher
description: "Hakou Watcher" is a high-speed action rougelike game.

name: Horse Life: Find Horses in Open World, Survive in Wild Nature as a Foal or Pony
description: Play as a horse in this horse life simulation game. Survive among predators like wolves or bears. Find other horses to make a family. Explore an open world, reveal mysteries. Survival game in wild nature as a foal or a pony. Find secrets in this scandinavian inspired environment.

name: Juuden Youshuugi: Crimson Paraselene
description: A Touhou-inspired bullet hell shooting game where you play as magic-using anthropomorphic characters. Explore Lunamara, a land full of magical creatures and youkai, and discover why the moon's rotation around Earth has been halted.

name: Inpulse
description: You are flute. You are kaizo. You are music. Audiate your movement through the environment, and catch the sounds to propel yourself through the air. A hand-drawn, 2D musical platforming experience designed to make you into a kaizo master. March to your own music in Inpulse.

name: Immay
description: Reborn as the first princess of Trocnian and prevent the theft of your throne! Or not, maybe you want it to happen... In IMMAY, you have the power to write your own answers for a unique experience! Are you ready to take control and forge your own destiny?

name: Lock & Key: A Hunter's Legacy
description: Become an unlikely hero by exploring, building new gadgets, jumping, and shooting to find the elusive keys to a mysterious tower that has emerged from the ground without warning and awakened a terrible power.

name: Lost Along The Way
description: A captivating visual novel set in a private academy. Play as Alex, an introverted protagonist, and uncover a mysterious secret with newfound friends. Forge alliances or rivalries in this unforgettable adventure. Your choices shape the narrative.

name: Lisle Engle Heavy Distance
description: Heavy Distance is the ground breaking interactive single from Lisle Engle.

name: Light of Atlantis
description: In this 2D-Puzzle-Metroidvania you dive into the ruins of Atlantis. As a small robot you control the water level in various rooms to solve puzzles and discover the mysteries of an ancient society.

name: Let's Kill Hitler: The Game
description: RPG / Strategy / Deckbuilder, Solo / Multiplayer / Co-op. Travel back in time, kill Hitler, alone or with friends ! Defeat secret agents, UFOs, reptilians and other occult forces.

name: Mind Control: Bloody Renaissance
description: Mind Control is a mystical meta horror game about the unjust and mysterious nature of this world. You must go through pain and suffering to learn the truth. Remember that you are responsible for those you control.

name: Maze Girl
description: A long time ago, a beautiful princess was imprisoned by a demon in a maze. In this seemingly no exit maze, the princess could cast magic to change the space, so as to find a way out of one room after another, and finally regain her freedom.

name: Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil
description: Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil invites players to inherit a Jiu-jitsu gym in the favelas of Rio De Janeiro. Develop your gym, teach your students, and train your fighters. As your business grows, expand into new gyms throughout the city and build a martial arts empire.

name: Mankind's Last Stand
description: Mankind's Last Stand is an epic off-world 3rd-person shooter. Take command of the mighty Decimator, customize and upgrade its weapons to crush alien invaders. Prepare for intense boss fights, stock up on boosters, and reclaim all zones to restore order.

name: MaidGardener
description: This is an action game where you control a gardener's maid and catch the Insectors flying around the stage in a cage. However, you need to be careful when catching them. It is important to avoid attacks and catch them well in cages. If you clear the stage, you can get an illustration (for adults).

name: My Furry Succubus
description: You just found a mysterious old lamp in your uncle's garage. Nothing bad can happen if you rub it, right?...

name: Multiverse Go
description: Multiverse Go is a turn-based puzzle game. The game invites players to embark on an epic journey through parallel universes and different cultures.

name: Nameless Bastard
description: In this hyper-stylized isometric fantasy rogue-lite, embark on a generations-long journey to defeat the corruption spreading from a nearby dungeon. Fight, die, upgrade, repeat, as you descend into the depths of the dungeon in order to make a name for yourself.

name: Nebula's Descent
description: Colorful bite-sized roguelike twin-stick bullet-hell dungeon crawler! Explore a procedurally generated research lab, throw black holes at monsters, dodge lasers, and fight a final boss beyond comprehension!

name: My Mistress Lu Bu
description: You were born into the rough hands of the notorious group of bandits, the Yellow Turbans. After their downfall, you lead a small crew of bandits until you're defeated by the warlord Lu Bu. She spares you in exchange for your fealty, and thus begins your service to your mistress Lu Bu.​

name: Mobbers
description: Mobbers is a roguelike dungeon shooter with randomised items, rooms, themes and enemies. Choose to play as the Goblin, Skeleton, Slime or Kobold and turn against the other mobs in the dungeon to escape, gear up and then fight against the approaching heroes trying to loot your home.

name: ORM
description: Journey through a dark world, as a young woman fights to break free from a curse, that threatens to forever trap her in the world of the supernatural killer - The Collector.

name: Oni Oneesan
description: Two Oni princesses are looking for a mate, one human looks to save his people by marrying into their kingdom. Before the Oni court approves however, he'll have to prove able to rein in their excesses, and maybe teach the two quarrelling sisters a thing or two about ruling.

name: Oblation
description: Oblation is a story rich rogue like which main character can use his blood as a weapon.

name: Next Sweetstop
description: Unveil the chilling narrative of "Next SweetStop," a psychological horror game where you embody a woman enduring the nightshift at an eerie gas station. Haunted by a relentless stalker, she must conquer her deepest fears to survive the gripping suspense that unfolds in this atmospheric nightmare.

name: No Stone Unturned
description: Hunt for clues, interrogate suspects and solve cases! No Stone Unturned is a dark-comedy noir detective game featuring multiple endings and choices that truly matter!

name: PsyQik
description: PsyQik is a fast-paced psychedelic action game, featuring vibrant neon visuals and innovative interactive effects. Immerse yourself in an otherworldly adventure as you uncover the ultimate truth in a mesmerizing world that captivates your eyes and mind.

name: Pirate Runner
description: Play the famous pirate BLACK BEARD in this new generation Endless Runner with stunning photo-realistic graphics! Blizzard, sandstorm or torrential rain, try to survive as long as possible!

name: R4YL: Run for your life!
description: R4YL (RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!) is a thrilling infinite runner! Explore mysterious environments, dodge obstacles, and collect treasure as you push your limits. With stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and leaderboards, immerse yourself in this action-packed adventure. Will you become the ultimate runner?

name: Razgovor Online
description: Razgovor is an instanced based open world Metavers. Providing you new ways to explore and ways to interact with others around you. Create a new experiance alone, with friends or with people you meet on the way.

name: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars
description: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars is a thrilling real-time strategy (RTS)-lite game where players face off in an epic battle to determine which spread reigns supreme!

name: Scarlet Lake
description: Delve into a retro survival horror where everything is not what it seems. You control Ben Murphy, a detective sent to investigate the strange on-goings in a small town, only to be caught in a nightmare surrounded by terrifying creatures. What dark mysteries will you uncover in Scarlet Lake?

name: Scared Little Ghost
description: You are a ghost! Which is pretty difficult when you're afraid of everything…

name: Sayako Story
description: In the summer heat, under the bright sun, meeting a beautiful girl captures your heart. Do not miss the opportunity to meet and enjoy happy moments. Together create unforgettable memories full of love, smiles and adventures, rejoicing in this joyous time.

name: Reptile Park VR
description: As a survivor of a tragic plane crash, you fight for survival on an island inhabited by prehistoric creatures. Explore, fight, survive and uncover the history of the tragic consequences of an experiment. Immerse yourself in a survival adventure like never before.

name: Sinful Catalyst CH1: Ethereal Camellia
description: Sinful Catalyst is a dark fantasy visual novel with a puzzle/action battle system. Follow Gyulia's journey on the Second Circle, battle nasty butlers, and fall at the hands of the first Mistress, Lilith.

name: Simp Simulator 2023
description: You're a simp! You live in 21st-Century America, and you work from home in a tiny, dimly-lit apartment. The joy of your existence is going on 'OnlySimps' and worshipping beautiful Goddesses! But Goddesses require payment. So you must go to work to provide for your Queen and hold her affection!

name: Shadow Of The Devil
description: This game is an action, adventure, and horror game played from a first-person shooter (FPS) perspective. The main goal of the game is to immerse players in an exciting world and provide them with an engaging experience.

name: Shirime 2: The Genesis of Butt-Eye
description: Get ready for a thrilling and terrifying adventure in 'Shirime 2: The Genesis of Butt-Eye'. Uncover the secrets behind the curse as you explore a mysterious inn. Engaging storyline, intense combat, third-person perspective, and stunning visuals await. Prepare for a spine-chilling experience!

name: Sex Survivals
description: Kill lots of rocking enemies and survive to the end of your porn workout! Porn Survivals is a casual game with an emphasis on humor and memes with elements of a simplistic RPG. Here, every decision you make can cause an avalanche of consequences for the hordes of enemies you have to fight!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Desert
description: Puzzles of desert!

name: Survival Revelation: End of Days
description: Welcome to this multiplayer survival sandbox game! In this world, you will need to establish your own survival base from scratch, collect materials, make tools, build towns, manufacture weapons, explore unknown fields, and so on. You can team up with other players and survive together, as well as en

name: The Time Plague
description: The Time Plague is a steampunk first person shooter with a great story and lots of locations to explore. You play as a journalist drawn into a mysterious world of time travel and adventure, learning to handle dangerous ray guns and other strange technology to overcome the devious Morlocks.

name: Vilde
description: Vilde is a Norse myth-inspired roguelite FPS. Procedurally generated levels and RPG elements. Battle resurrected foes, earn boons, and permanently upgrade your character. Join 4-player co-op or play alone in a dark and epic world inspired by Norse mythology and Viking culture

name: Vaporwave Pinball
description: Play LoFi digital pinball in a variety of cosy, chill locations. Explore a 90s operating system to find new worlds. Uncover hidden, corrupted files. For a couple of hours, escape the real world. Vaporwave Pinball is the ultimate "virtual holiday" destination.

name: Vaulted
description: Vaulted is a roguelike game that combines elements of top-down shooter, deckbuilder, RPG and immersive sim. Venture into randomly generated dungeons in search of resources and powerful equipment to ensure your settlement survives.

name: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity
description: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity is sequel to our first game Tyrannis, and it brings back the accessible turn-based asymmetric gameplay as you fight a massive megacorporation along the Pacific Rim. Battle the Kirihara Group's Security Division across 40 new maps and a brand new campaign mode!

name: UMBA
description: 3D online magic duel (PvP), with sandbox-like Magic Lab and real time non-target combat system. The game combines exciting mix of ability to create your own spells & skills in the Magic Lab and battle it out in the magic combat.

name: Underdose
description: In a not-too-distant, retro-future world shaken by a shortage of medicine, a talented pharmacist is accused of murdering Patient Zero. He flees to the slums, where he tries to survive in isolation until he can recreate the formula for the drug that will save his life.

name: Turn By Turn Villain
description: Be the bad guy, do good: Play as a demon forced to walk the human world in this Turn-Based Action RPG! Engage your ex-minions in chaotic brawls! Choose your actions quickly from a classic menu but mind your Turn Points! Collect Light to dispel the darkness... your dark mess!

name: Twilight Memoria: Freedoom
description: Two lives. Two different fates. Unravel the destiny Evelyn and Laiza will face, changing their lives for better, or for worse. A fateful story packed in JRPG format with complex yet interesting mechanics.

name: TLO: Casmita
description: The religious mission of a warrior in a far southwestern country. An adventure game with elements of research, seasoned with combat, dialogues, a well-developed system of impact and interaction with the world. Inspired by the philosophy of nihilism.

name: Voidseekers
description: Voidseekers is a 1-4 player co-op horror FPS. Shoot, salvage, and survive as you explore abandoned ships in deep space. Risk it all to bring back the largest prizes, but beware the horrors that seek in the void.

name: Wish a Wish
description: Discover an ordinary boy's extraordinary fate as he encounters a magical body pillow, facing life-altering choices in this captivating visual novel. Engaging story, stunning visuals, meaningful choices, and immersive relationships await in 'Wish a Wish'.

name: BroChicken
description: BroChicken is a light Rouge Like 3D game created by Unreal Engine. Players can play various roles, get gold coins, various weapons and props in battle, choose to improve their capability. Weapons can be synthesized into super weapons, which unlock cool full-screen effect and AOE attack effects.

name: Beans or Bones
description: A fun 2-player online co-op pirate game for having a good time with your best buddy. Stranded on a cannibal island, your only chance of survival is to make the cannibals like veggie food. Go on quests, fly with birds, paddle in a barrel, and use your bubble shooter to fight sharks.

name: Night at the Full Moon Motel
description: Short horror-thriller game for Game Boy. Play a character in need of cash, who is hired to be night manager at a strange motel. Explore the motel and its surroundings to reveal it's secrets, fulfil guests requests and keep them happy because your life could depend on it.

name: Retrograde
description: Retrograde is an arcade-style game set in space where players control a space ship and must avoid asteroids by shooting lasers. The objective is to achieve high scores by staying alive for as long as possible. With retro-inspired visuals and audio, the game combines skillful maneuvering, quick reflexes, and strategic decision-making to create an addictive and competitive experience.

name: Fall Into Insanity
description: Fall Into Insanity is a First-Person Atmospheric Horror Game using the power of Unreal Engine 5. Your friends have gone missing under mysterious circumstances and it is up to you to find them. What you find, might just drive you to Insanity.

name: Aster Tatariqus
description:
Find your destiny in love, friendship, or family in the newest tactical RPG from Studio FgG!
Scheduled for release in 2023, Aster Tatariqus is a high fantasy smartphone game with tactical battles and an immersive story!

name: Semicolon Island
description: Semicolon Island is a multiplayer-focused sandbox building game, which aims to give its players large amounts of freedom to create anything their minds can come up with.

name: Mortal Kombat Project
description: A Mortal Kombat fan game made on Mugen.

name: Flowerpeer
description: Sin descripción

name: Anti Japanese Heroes
description: This is a horizontal action game with 6 optional characters, including Farmer, Martial Monk, Qigong Master, Eighth Route, Secret Service, and King of Slingshot. Faced with countless invaders, can you kill all the enemies or end the game?

name: Midnight Door
description: A girl befriends a strange and powerful creature; the duo goes on an interdimensional adventure in this 16-bit inspired top-down action-adventure! Explore environments both familiar and fantastical while engaging in precise and strategic combat with bizarre creatures.

name: Survivor's guilt
description: A great earthquake with a magnitude of 9.2 occurred. The day when rescue arrives is unknown. Make full use of your smart phone and the supplies you have left, and continue to fight against the hunger and fear that is attacking you.

name: Aviophobia
description: In Aviophobia, you take on the role of a airline passenger who suddenly is all alone. Or is he? After a large part of the power supply has failed, you quickly realize that something isn't right. Now it's up to you to find out what's going on here and how to get off this plane as fast as possible.

name: Tendrils And Plates
description: Tendrils and Plates is an Open World Sci-Fi Space Survival Shooter RPG under development by a solo indie developer. You begin in a scout starship and learn to survive in a hostile solar system. Build your base and take on missions in space and on numerous ground locations.

name: Battle Store
description: Battle store - IDLE game where you take management of a small street food point under your control. Watch your employee work, gain money and upgrade your store!

name: Sensory Deprivation
description: This is a visual novel. The theme at the center of the story is what consciousness is. Your task in the game is to understand the essence of being. The main character is a successful, intelligent man who designs humanoid robots. He tries to understand if robots have consciousness.

name: Abyss Dive
description: Abyss Dive is a 2D side-view game where the player as a diver explores the ocean and with the help of his harpoon, can break air shells, fend off underwater monsters, and also fight his way to a mysterious treasure!

name: Otherworld Hero
description: In this turn-based tactical RPG you will take control of a hero from a different time and place, plucked out of their own reality. And now... meet the expectations of the people and become the all beloved hero or forge your own path and reshape the world to whatever your taste is.

name: Mitrapunk
description: Manage software development in huge organization. Select most promising features, negotiate about architecture and ownership, build features and get promoted. All processes are similar to real development in FAANG.

name: Tropity
description: Tropity is an open-world island where you can do anything and everything. From building cool functional houses where all the furniture works and serves a purpose, Getting a job that is fully interactable and immersive, Or your own in-game business doing anything you want? It's all here at Tropity!

name: Rescue Contest
description: The circus gained popularity with impressive acts, like turning pigs into barbecue, captivating and attracting large crowds. However, due to financial crisis, the circus had to close and the director decided to sell the animals.
