name: Frostfall
description: A deadly pandemic leaves you suddenly stranded in the arctic north with no way home. With enough supplies for just a few days, you must venture out into the unforgiving cold, and embrace the unknown.

name: Space Entity
description: Space Entity is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. A entity is within the space ship. Get the power back on and use the escape pods to live on.

name: Re: Be
description: Re:Be is a story-based action RPG 2D platformer game. In Re:Be, you become the protagonist and embark on a lengthy adventure to find the people who suddenly disappeared in an increasingly contaminated Earth.

name: Sakura in Paris
description: “Sakura in Paris” is a Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim. Play as Sakura Maeda as she travels to Paris, learns about her father and, if everything goes right, may fall in love with the woman of her dreams along the way.

name: Neon Parkour 2
description: Control a blue cube and complete challenging trails and puzzles to reach the target! Red cubes that will destroy you the moment you touch them! Help the blue cube reach its destination in Neon Parkour, which has a minimal design. Jump, dash and swing to solve challenging trails!

name: Cecil Hollow
description: Venture to Cecil Hollow and investigate the strange events that have driven away the previous owners. Cecil Hollow is a sci-fi horror game with a rich atmosphere set in modern day Kentucky.

name: Rogue Day
description: Rogue Day is a open world city simulator in third person view where you play as a super hero. There are two cities to explore.

name: Medical Shift: The Emergency Room Simulator
description: In "Medical Shift" you become a dedicated doctor in the emergency room, responsible for diagnosing, treating, and saving lives. This professional simulation offers an immersive experience of the challenges and rewards of working in a fast-paced medical environment.

name: Freeman
description: Freeman - Immersive sim shooter in Sci-fi setting. Chased by pursuers, without a penny behind his back, but with fire in his eyes! Destroy enemies on planets and in space, travel, save friends and punish enemies!

name: Staircase55
description: An atmospheric psychological horror game that plunges you into an anomalous, paradoxical stairwell. Equipped only with a flashlight, navigate the procedurally generated abyss and face the ever-adapting AI. Unravel the mysteries of SCP-087 in this unique horror experience.

name: Venus One: Galactic Overlords
description: Outwit or perish in VOGO, a thrilling turn-based strategy game. In every move, you have a chance to surround more territory and destroy more structures than your opponent. But be careful, because every move can also be a trap. Outsmart your rival and claim victory in VOGO!

name: Limit Choice
description: In this game, a wide variety of unique cards will make their appearance, each wielding diverse skills to support your battles. With every confrontation against enemies and overcoming of difficult trials, your deck evolves, gaining ever-increasing power.

name: Overhours
description: From building makeshift traps, to defending her new friends from danger and taking back precious time. Overhours is a single-player action tower defense game set in a dystopian media agency that steals time. One employee, together with an unexpected ghostly partner, is trying to retrieve it all.

name: Torn
description: Join an all-out sci-fi vehicular warfare using all possible variations of battle technologies including robots, tanks, wheeled machines, hovers mounted with deadly weapons that can be combined in hundreds of different ways.

name: Blinding Oversight
description: You play as Emma, who wakes up in an abandoned house without any prior memory of how she ended up there. Investigate your surroundings, uncover the mysteries of the house and connect memories from your past in this first person atmospheric horror game.

name: Kromlech
description: Embark on a journey in this dark fantasy action-adventure game to find out why the tapestry of the world is suddenly unraveling itself and even the gods themselves seem powerless to stop it. Sharpen your blade, gather your companions, and prepare to make the last stand as the world around you burns.

name: Predefined
description: Predefined is a 3D puzzle game where planning is key. Navigate a burrow through levels filled with puzzles and obstacles. Enjoy Twitch Integration for interactive gameplay and community collaboration.

name: Bot Crafter
description: Construct, maintain, manage and upgrade the fleet of your space robots in this sandbox crafter. Gather resources, automate your base, develop new technologies and face the challanges of the foreign exoplanet. Use your engineering skills to survive, solve problems and conquere the New Home.

name: Dimhaven Enigmas
description: After several years, the team behind Quern - Undying Thoughts is back with new mysteries to unfold. Explore Dimhaven, solve mind-bending puzzles and uncover the truth behind the Ravenwood legacy in this first-person adventure.

name: Project Glasloc
description: Project Glasloc is a co-operative horror game playable for up to 5 Volunteers. Work together to survive dives into old facilities trying to acquire and upload important data for our glorious organization. Nothing could possibly go wrong and don't worry about the employee turn-over rates.

name: Pirateer: High Seas
description: Piracy has never been this fun! Sail the high seas, plundering booty. Start off in a small ship that you can use to ram other ships to plunder their gold. As you explore and discover new locations, you can upgrade your ships features or even buy a new one. The choice is yours.

name: Terminate: Study X
description: Become the machine, find out what happened in New Sapiens and eradicate the infected in a single player first-person shooter campaign of horror and gore.

name: Road Dealer Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a dishonest car dealer. Cheats customers by selling them damaged cars for a high price. In this mission, your loyal dog is invaluable in helping you repair everything that's broken and also deterring unhappy customers. Will you be able to become the king of car trading?

name: Harpoon Reef Hunter
description: First-Person underwater fishing game that takes you from colorful coral reefs to the depths of the open sea to discover all the species of fish. Become a seasoned harpoon hunter by upgrading your equipment to find the rarest fish out there.

name: Frontera
description: Frontera is a fantasy city builder and colony sim where you start with a small camp at the edge of a dark forest. Build up your settlement and economy to attract more settlers. Form a military to clear the forest, and claim it for yourself!

name: Neverending Check-in: The Hotel Stories
description: Immerse yourself in The Neverending Check-In: The Hotel Stories, a pixel RPG filled with mystery, quests, cats, humor and life universe. Rebuild a once-glorious hotel and uncover its secret past in this captivating journey of deep plots, lively characters, and abundant quests.

name: Gate One
description: Survive with your team as long as possible and discover different worlds with different loot.

name: Breaking Friendships
description: A relaxing social game for two people. Use the knowledge about your friend to generate electricity for time-traveling residents.

name: Welcome to Mars 9
description: "Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River" is a classic graphic adventure game where you will navigate a luxurious space station orbiting Mars, uncovering dark secrets and making ethical choices. The game's pixel art creates a captivating world with multiple endings, offering a journey of self-discovery

name: Voxel Mage: Siege
description: Voxel Mage is a cross-platform, multiplayer, voxel destruction party game! Grab some friends, play against others online, or enjoy offline matches against AI in this game of magic mayhem that packs a serious punch!

name: Home: A Story of Light
description: Home: A Story of Light is a narrative-driven point and click adventure game that follows Grayson, the son of a great inventor. Alongside his devoted pet mouse, he struggles to make his way through the perilous north-east of Victorian England.

name: Bucky's Grounds
description: Bucky's Grounds is a first-person Retro style mascot horror game, where you uncover the dark truth of a mysterious town within another dimension, visit the Khancoban playground while avoiding the sweet toothed rabbit who despises yellow light.

name: Scroomage
description: Destroy property, kill companies, run fast, and punch opposing workers in this fast-paced first person shooter.

name: King Story: Prologue
description: A storm of darkness is taking over the world. Adventure in search of your quest escaping the demon darkness that chases you. Upgrade your items to progress through the maze like environment in this Metroidvania-like challenge. Can you find a Hermit's lost son in your quest to save the world?

name: Tarmac Legends
description: After an intense race with a stranger turns fatal, driver Aaron Mitchell is put in prison for 25 years for a murder he didn't commit. When the police find new evidence for the real suspect, Mitchell is promised parole if he works undercover for the S.R.A and catches the true killer.

name: Sayfield Defense
description: A Tower Defense game with an integrated FPS system! Sayfield Defense sets place in a post apocalyptic world! Use towers, tactical powers and more unique mechanics to defend your base from the zombies at all cost!

name: Haunted Memories: The Return
description: Haunted Memories: The Return is a psychological horror in which you assume the role of yourself. You decide which path you will take and what will happen in Green Park this time. But the question remains - will you ever be able to leave?

name: A Deep Rest
description: A Deep Rest is a collection of short stories about men and their relationship with mental health and depression. Taking control of a different character in each story, you will experience life from their perspective. See the problems and issues they face and help them find ways to be alright again.

name: Daedalus: You Have Been Chosen
description: Go on a scary adventure, whether you decide to face the dangerous path alone or team up with your friends. This intense game guarantees a mysterious experience every time you play. Get ready to solve tricky puzzles, avoid a terrifying monster, and fight your way out of the intricate maze.

name: Wholesome: Heartdrawn
description: Wholesome: Heartdrawn is a Turn-Based RPG and adventure game about Lyra, who creates her world to imagine her memories to escape from some things. Explore real and imagined worlds, and go on adventures. Lead Lyra and help her handle everything.

name: Parallel Pals
description: Parallel Pals is a 2D puzzle platformer where you control 2 players. The bottom Player is stuck in the level and can't reach the platforms to proceed. The top Player should find/craft resources and send them through the portal connecting two players.

name: Escape Simulator VR
description: Venture into captivating escape rooms solo or in an online co-op with up to 8 players (optimal 2-3). Pick up and examine everything, break objects, solve locks, and decipher puzzles to escape! After finishing the main game, watch for free content updates and explore 3000+ community-made rooms.

name: SiideQuest
description: A medieval fantasy, open-world, souls-like indie RPG, told through side quests instead of a main storyline. Explore the land of Noh'relia by helping strangers, slaying monsters, discovering hidden treasures, and connecting the dots to move on from your troubled past.

name: Doppelganger: Nightmare Realm
description: This is a dark story about a little boy trying to survive in a parallel world of his doppelganger. You will have to experience adventures in places of life and death of your doppelganger, solve all the puzzles, and make your way from the cemetery to birth.

name: Invaders from the Third Dimension
description: A retro space game with 3D graphics and modern controls. Rotate your ship and shoot at any angle, instead of just sliding back and forth. Enjoy 3D graphics with lighting effects and realistic explosions.

name: Blind Frontiers
description: Embark on an RPG-survival road trip adventure with Niuma, a unique and singular character on a quest to uncover The Eldorado. Navigate through a post-war world marked by limited resources. Explore cities, interact with locals, and manage resources while confronting your stigmas to survive.

name: Spell Hell
description: Spell Hell is a top-down arena roguelite where you play as a powerful wizard with advanced combo magics, to fight off hordes of monsters. Design your build with synergizing upgrades creating powerful combos, and defeat waves of enemies.

name: Traders of Natac
description: Traders of Natac is a realtime resource management simulation. Settle in resource-rich areas, trade with dynamic prices, expand your empire across the board and claim victory over all of Natac!

name: The Realm of Insight Compass
description: The Realm of Insight Compass is a turn-based tactical chess game that features a rotating board and a unique terrain system, adding more challenge and strategic depth to the gameplay.Formations are like chessboards, and chessboards are like life.

name: Dragon's Doom: A Skyhopper Tale
description: Start as a hatchling dragon, you have one goal: To Survive. The best way to survive? Is to fight, burn and eat your way into growing to a full fledge dragon. Burn the villages to the ground!

name: Prospect
description: Prospect is a turn-based tactics game focusing on immersive, in-depth combat and takes place inside a dystopian penal colony on a distant, hostile planet. In combat, take advantage of the powerful "Trial & Execute" system to plan, modify, and carry out the actions of your choice.

name: Gonshit infarct
description: You are correct, but "gOnshit infarct" is a brand new romance simulation visual novel developed by AGC GAMES. The game takes place in a fantasy world called "Tiamat," where chosen individuals are bestowed with the power of "Free to play" to guide the flow of memes.

name: AstroPuffs
description: Crash landed on an alien planet with your crew, build an awesome base and advance it through Exploration, Science, Crafting and Salvaging. Face Rival Factions, Deadly Bosses, Alien Wildlife and other Planetside Mysteries in this Valheim inspired Colony Sim.

name: Fix Fixer
description: Fix Fixer is Action RPG with Roguelike elements which you play through Hephaestus' procedurally generated universes as an one and only handyman of him, Fix Fixer!

name: Vulpis
description: Guide a lonely fox through a vast interconnected world of a mysterious planet Vulpis in this Metroidvania-style game. Explore non-linear paths, unlock new abilities, fight enemies, overcome obstacles, and unravel the planet's mysteries to find a way back home.

name: Kaardik
description: Join the exciting world of Kaardik, a creature collection game. Embark on exciting adventures with your Kaardiks in the fascinating region of Kodumaa. Capture all the Kaardiks, battle with other trainers, and beat the king.

name: Live at Strummer's Pond
description: Come for a visit to Strummer's Pond with your friends! It's a cozy place full of tiny musical critters. Explore, ride a frog, pollinate flowers, and play some tunes along the way. ✨

name: Rise and Grind!
description: We call you to survive in a world that only wakes you up once a year. Wake up, collect, build, expand, be prepared for dangers, and sleep for one year! Each awakening brings a new adventure, an opportunity to become stronger!

name: Little Mall Tycoon
description: Let's make your dream mall! Hire great employees and train them. Sell everything that customers want. Upgrade your mall and prepare to deal with unexpected events. Be the best mall in the world.

name: Xochi's Apothecary
description: A deceptively cozy narrative game about an alchemist that immigrates to a new country and opens an apothecary. Get to know your weird and wonderful community, brew the potions your customers need, and use your words to stir up a country on the brink of change.

name: Fist of Yokai
description: Prepare to throw down in a world where steam meets the supernatural, as you hack and slash your way through a procedurally generated maze filled with yokai horrors. Upgrade yourself and slash through yokai leaders to save the steampunk metropolis in this exciting rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Defenders of Legends
description: Defend your kingdom against legendary monsters. Place turrets strategically to block their path. Upgrade your defenses to fend off enemy hordes. Become the legendary guardian of the earth alone or in co-op!

name: Wild City
description: Shape your urban ecosystem in Wild City, a unique roguelike deckbuilder! Rule a harmonious society or indulge in the citizens' primal instincts, as you shape your own concrete jungle!

name: LongStory 2
description: Award-winning LongStory gets a sequel! The Weasel Heights gang continues to surprise and delight as you learn more about yourself, friendship and love. Play as the gender of your choice and date the friend you like best. Throw a big mystery in the mix and you’re in for an adventure!

name: The Event
description: The Event is a first-person psychological horror game that offers immersive gameplay and a rich narrative. Find yourself stuck in mystery and struggle in the dark against paranormal activities, demons from other worlds and much more. Will you be able to find out the truth and return home?

name: A Silly Goofy Dream 2
description: This game is funny, it is not meant to be taken seriously. ASGD2 is a funny exploration style game in which you go around finding funny NPC's and interacting with them, trying to find them all in a vast world.

name: Touhou Hareiden
description: Touhou Project Doujin JRPG game. The youseis are wreaking havoc in Gensokyo, intensifying the frustrations of summer. Embark on a quest with Hakurei Reimu and Kirisame Marisa as they aim to resolve this incident while Marisa seeks to reclaim her lost powers.

name: Dice Mayor
description: Welcome to Dice city, new mayor. Govern your city with only dice. Dice Mayor combines dice rolling with city building in a roguelike setting.

name: The Directorate: The Spy Who Killed A Saint
description: Play as a spy vying to stop unthinkable destruction. Sneak, fight and trick your way through countless grunts, guards and bosses. The 60s themed comical experience will challenge you to foil the destructive plans of a malevolent overlord within pre-set in game hours.

name: Agent Team Simulator: Your Agent in the Game
description: Unleash your imagination and create your very own Agent to feature across all versions of the game!

name: Island Notes
description: The yacht is in distress, you and a stranger (optional character) are stranded on a desert island, and you must use everything around you to stay with her until rescue arrives. The game includes a variety of gameplay, such as building, planting, love cultivation, hunting, catching, cooking, etc.

name: Matinta
description: Embark on an epic journey in "Matinta," a Brazilian adventure game. Guide Gracinda to restore natural landscapes and free forest entities. Explore enchanting scenarios, immerse in nature's wonders. With stunning art and soundtrack, Matinta delivers fun, and deep connection with nature.

name: ZombieWave FM
description: ZombieWave FM is an immersive 1980s zombie-survival shooter. Fight through waves, restore power, unlock areas, and save Gloomtown. Single-player, co-op, and multiplayer modes. Customization, diverse weapons, retro visuals, and a haunting soundtrack. Survive the undead and reclaim the town!

name: Soulkeeper Diaries
description: Soulkeeper Diaries is a story-based action adventure game that takes place in different worlds. Help Dogu to find his homeland while exploring worlds and islands with his balloon.

name: Dignacia
description: You are missioned to stimulate one of the planets in Dignacia Universe, Feed your animals and plant your seeds with using advanced technology. Upgrade your tools, explore the mysteries of the planet, dive into water, manage the city that you build and destroy bad creatures for bringing peace!

name: The Submerging Island
description: Conquer an industrial wasteland to save your sinking home. Battle adversaries, make choices, and become the hero against global warming. A first ever third-person RPG on Global Warming.

name: Artificial Fright
description: Artificial Fright is a tense horror survival game where you play as an assistant robot in an old, abandoned warehouse. Explore your surroundings, conserve your battery power, and manage your systems using a Unix-like terminal.

name: Mutrix
description: Mutrix is a music movement VR game, in which players need to use a lightsaber to slash flying notes, the greater the movement, the higher the score. The game library is rich, covering a variety of styles of music. Let's rhythm together!

name: Mines Of Moritania
description: Experimental, None Linear, Cosmic Horror Game.

name: RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone
description: In RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone - Embark on a slapstick-filled adventure where mishaps are the norm. Keep your wits about you, dodge calamity, and quickly complete tasks without getting injured!

name: Ecumene Aztec
description: The Great Tenochtitlan is on fire. Now that the war has broken out, I must choose whether to join our compatriots to repel the invader, or to join the newcomers who want to liberate us from the priests sacrificing our own brothers and children.

name: Charon: Zhetan Chronicles
description: Overcome the chasm ordained by divine fate! Charon - Zhetan Chronicles is a 2D Fantasy RPG with pixel art visuals. An epic story with queer characters, strategic battles and handmade artworks awaits you!

name: Fox Adventure: Homeward Journey
description: A challenging 2D platform game.

name: SS.Archives
description: This is a text adventure game with elements of horror, suspense, and puzzle-solving. Players take on the role of a detective, encountering various mysterious cases. These cases may be bizarre, eerie, or seemingly calm on the surface, but with turbulent undercurrents beneath.

name: Wordsock Classic
description: Compete in local or online word battles. Supports solo mode with or without AI players.

name: Hufu Riding and Shooting
description: 胡服騎射 Hufu riding and shooting is a third-person control RPG Game.From far east mainland, Their are 7 lord in "Zhou" period.This is about 2,200 years ago. you lead your army to ride horses and shoot arrows to expand your land.

name: SkyDribble
description: Dribble the object to reach the goal! In the bottomless sky! A simple mouse-only 3D platformer game that anyone can enjoy.

name: Times Of War
description: "Times Of War" - A sci-fi tower defense strategy game with armored vehicles, tanks, choppers, planes, explosive action, and three unique environments. Upgrade towers, earn Tech points, manage resources, and defend your base in epic battles. Get ready for intense warfare!

name: Creepless
description: This is a multiplayer co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Collect items, repair car and get out! But monsters will bother you.

name: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners Prologue
description: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners Prologue is a first part of the Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners.

name: Backrooms Abyss
description: Explore and survive levels based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level offers various escape routes but also introduces perilous obstacles. Players can immerse themselves in the seemingly boundless and unsettling levels of the backrooms, experiencing the game's eerie and intricate mazes.

name: Happiness Market
description: A simple simulation and management game. Build different shops and earn money from passing customers.

name: Food Magician
description: Food Magician is an fantasy action-adventure/RPG game that filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins. With stunning graphics and beautiful music, Food Magician features various gameplay mechanics, including real-time combat, traps, and puzzle-solving.

name: The Chronicles of Eleos: The Hall of Azaron
description: The Chronicles of Eleos: The Hall of Azaron is a classic RPG where we control an archaeologist wizard on a journey through the continent of Eleos, a place with various peoples and cultures and full of mysteries and craziness just waiting for a nosy enough wizard to reveal them.

name: Ocean Explorer
description: Journey through the decaying world of 2048. A time for exploration and discovery. The quest begins to reclaim the lost world maps.

name: Project Hoyrá
description: Project Hoyrá is a Narrative Action-Adventure game in third-person view taking place in a brand new post-apocalyptic fantasy world. In the demo you will play as Elduin, controlling the water element, to try and find a lost civilization supposed to be the last remaining elemental nation.

name: Cat Lobster Simulator
description: Beautiful simple and cute game where you raise a Cat Lobster. Feed, play, wash and rest your cat lobster in real time. Earn gold coins in minigames, and customise the lobster's tank! If you raise your cat lobster well, it will moult its shell and evolve into an adult cat lobster.

name: GimmickHeart
description: Sin descripción

name: Drugz: 2D Drug Empire Simulator
description: Become a true Drug Lord in Drugz, an idle strategy game. Buy cheap, sell high, invest money in facilities and dodge police operations and rival gangs to expand your empire. Become the greatest Drug Lord in history and become a legend.

name: Small Nights
description: Explore the thrilling places, that you end up as you sleep... What could this be all for? What mysteries await?

name: Gloomscape
description: Step into the eerie and mysterious world of Gloomscape! With your trusty mood ring and sense of adventure, you’ll craft, explore, and strategize your way through this bizarre world. But beware - ghastly creatures lurk around every corner.

name: The Lost Hotel
description: Welcome to The Lost Hotel, a pixel art adventure/mystery game where you take on the role of a hotelier, saving the hotel from an endless time loop. Explore the hotel and interact with a diverse cast of characters. Uncover secrets and solve puzzles to unravel the mystery of the hotel's past.

name: War Of Celestials
description: Join the fight for world domination as the Celestials fight over territory. Play your way with multiple different classes and sub classes. Want to assassinate people or perhaps you want to cast fire ball no matter the room size, either way there is a play style for everyone.

name: Wyrmhole: The Forbidden Knowledge
description: A daemon spawned by a lab accident steals the Sacred Texts of Fauna Akademia and vanishes into the tunnels beneath. As the Head Librarian May, and with a team of laboratory researchers, conquer the tunnels and demand on time book returns.

name: Choice of Rebels: Stormwright
description: The uprising continues! You fled the armies of the Hegemony into a nightmare wilderness. Now escape the storms of chaos magic to spread the flames of your rebellion in this epic fantasy RPG.

name: Dan Factory
description: You are reincarnated into a valley full of spiritual energy, using the Eight Trigrams Formation to complete the automated production of elixirs, and exploring the past stories of this continent in the world of monsters and monsters;

name: Bennu Bennu: Protect the Pyramid
description: In this fast-paced, cooperative wave defence game, you ARE the towers. Defeat wave after wave, create powerful combos and personalize your playstyle through the randomized upgrade system. Every round is different!

name: Aftershock: Coastline
description: Aftershock: Coastline is a thrilling retro-styled survival horror shooter inspired by the design of Resident Evil and the atmosphere of Bioshock. Spend an hour delving deep into a seaside bunker in an uncanny land, uncovering its secrets and surviving against the cosmic horrors which dwell within.

name: Patou
description: When Kit finds herself all alone in a dream-like world, giant dog Patou comes along. On their journey home, strange creatures and lonely spirits await, guarding ruins of memories buried deep.

name: Damned 2
description: Damned 2 is a asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where a group of survivors must come together to solve puzzles and escape an immersive environment while another player takes the role of a unbeatable monster ready to slay all trespassers.

name: Elemental Odyssey
description: Elemental Odyssey is 2D platformer where you need to RUN, JUMP, SLIDE, AVOID TRAPS, and don't let the game make you mad!!

name: Gravity Waves
description: Gravity Waves is a twin stick shoot 'em up in space with waves of enemies and realistic gravity to provide constantly changing gameplay.

name: Drill Keeper
description: Drill Keeper combines roguelite deckbuilding and tower defense into a strategic battle for survival. Dig through completely destructible worlds to strip them of their riches and build an impenetrable fortress of mining.

name: Firestorm Deadland
description: Firestorm Deadland is a first-person shooter survival horror game where you have to survive as much time as you can by defending the world against unHumans and unknown species in the year 2063.

name: Cupid
description:
CUPID is a logic puzzle game made for the Game Boy Color.

Something or someone has broken the Heart, a magical relic that stitches all things together. Without it, the universe will slowly unravel and everything will fall into darkness. Play as a cute little Cupid, tasked with mending the broken Heart. Do your best to spread love and happiness to all that you meet and prevent the darkness from taking hold!

name: Desolated District
description: Desolated District is an open world survival game. Loot, craft, build and fight in a post-apocalyptic dystopia, alone or with friends. Explore the dark and dangerous depths of the city while looking for a way out.

name: The Witch In The Woods
description: Deep in the perilous Greywind Forest reside a mysterious witch. She is rumored to be evil and dangerous. Nellie has her own reason to enter the forest. When she encounters the witch, what will happen? This is a light yuri fantasy visual novel.

name: Nine Paradise: The Origin
description: A Roguelike card game. In addition to hundreds of basic cards, there are also unique ways to practice martial arts and spells, and dozens of powerful magic artifacts and pets with their own characteristics, making the game more fun.

name: After School
description: Indie horror game, in which you will explore cursed school complex.

name: C17
description: Use keyboard and mouse to control characters to avoid monster attacks

name: Arknights: Release
description:
Arknights: Release is a fan-made game based on the Arknights IP using the Ikemen Go engine.

The game has various modes to choose from, such as arcade, two-player, online multiplayer, survival, lord conquest and so on. Currently, only arcade, two-player, survival and lord conquest are released in the test version.

name: Cosmic Carnage
description: Prepare for an interstellar showdown like no other in a gripping roguelite/roguelike top-down twin-stick shooter set in the vast depths of space. Pilot your advanced starship, engaging in relentless battles against hordes of alien adversaries. Destroy, Collect, Upgrade, Die, Unlock, Repeat.

name: Endless Dream
description: This game is a suspense micro fear love to AVG game, a total of three men can fall in love; Different male characters will bring you unique love experience.

name: Ground Zero
description: Fight through post-apocalyptic South Korea in this retro survival horror. Uncover the truth behind the devastating meteor impact that left the country in ruins and turned every living organism into a terrifying monstrosity. Fight. Solve puzzles. Upgrade gear. Make every bullet count.

name: Presence
description: Investigate, explore, and solve paranormal phenomena using technology as well as your own esoteric abilities, alone or with friends.

name: Sold Out
description: You play as a grocery store owner with limited starting capital and the only thing you can rely on is your business acumen. You will use operations such as purchasing, hoarding, and selling to satisfy your customers, so as to earn enough profits, um, and the rent that keeps rising.

name: Slag
description: You are tasked with servicing Terraformer Ai cores. To do this you will have to blast your way through the automated defense system. Turn the bots you come across into slag and get what "res" you can out of them as you will need it to load out your tank with different weapon and mods systems.

name: Sinister
description: An immersive 2D horror game set in an alternative Victorian London, with a horrifying fourth wall breaking twist.

name: The Maze
description: The Maze: a roguelite, maze-solving adventure fusing retro & modern co-op gameplay. Master a simple interface, explore intricate levels with varied mechanics & game modes. Outwit opponents in cat-and-mouse chases, dodge dangers, and unlock powers to reach the exit.

name: Wendigo
description: A stealth horror game in the woods, investigate and progress while drawing as little attention to yourself as possible.

name: WildCraft
description: Wildcraft: Embark on a Thrilling Journey of Online Survival Crafting Game that takes players on a captivating adventure in a vast and beautifully rendered 3D environment.

name: Last Life
description: Last Life is a breathtaking adventure game set in NeoNova, a cyberpunk city where high technology and dark secrets intertwine. Our protagonist, a cute cat controlled by players, will embark on a mysterious journey to find their lost lover.

name: CyberThreat
description: CyberThreat is an upcoming turn based RPG with life simulation elements, set in a modern day city. Can you win the war in CyberSpace, or will you fall to the viruses once and for all?

name: Path to the Unknown
description:
"Path to the Unknown" is an exciting adventure that will transport you to a world of mysteries, puzzles, and challenges. In this game, you take on the role of a courageous explorer embarking on a journey through unknown territories to uncover ancient secrets.

The game features a variety of brain teasers, complex puzzles, and intriguing riddles. You will explore abandoned and forgotten places, decipher codes, and discover hidden clues that will lead you to the next part of the puzzle.

At every turn, you will encounter new challenges and mysteries to unravel in order to progress on your journey. Your logical thinking, wit, and observation skills will be crucial. Collect indicators, find unlocked doors, and pave your way to the ultimate revelation.

Can you solve all the puzzles, overcome obstacles, and reach the final destination of your journey? Your adventure begins here. Embark on the "Path to the Unknown" and unlock a world of mysteries!

name: Chronicles of Vipers
description: Chronicles of Vipers is a remake-demake first-person shooter inspired by old 8-bit and 16-bit console games, as well as VHS-era movies.

name: RoboHunt
description: RoboHunt - fast top-down action shooter where you have to destroy a lot of robots. You will have to uncover the secrets of abandoned robotics labs and find a way to escape from the planet.

name: Rift Loopers: Pyro Class
description: Get access to the Pyro class and their arsenal

name: Kenny 7
description: In the near future, machines have taken over the world. Every 5 years, new models are produced that are always more advanced. The old models are destroyed because they are considered too obsolete. Kenny_7 models whose AI has failed have risen up against the established order. You are one of them.

name: Doozie the Unicorn
description: Doozie the Unicorn, a Gothic, Dark Fantasy, Medieval, Action, Adventure, Fairy-Tale.

name: Ned
description: Blast your way through hordes of enemies in Ned! An action-packed adventure platformer set in the rich history of the Aussie outback.

name: Grapple Cars
description: Party game where you drive bumper cars but with grapple hooks! Grapple Cars is a 2-4 player party game where your only means of movement is using a grapple hooks to pull and slingshot your bumper car around the level.

name: Demon's Bane
description: Save the animal kingdom in this innovative roguelike deckbuilder. Battle enemies, unlock abilities, and customize your deck. With 10 classes, 350+ cards, and a 100 different enemies. Experience strategic card combat with a twist. No In App Purchases.

name: Yodel-Oh!
description: Take on Ram-Bam, Lamb-Bam and the whole bleatin' clan in the exciting Alpine climbing adventure that pits your wits against the meanest sheep in the mountain. Loaded with half-crazed herds, twisting targets and awesome fairway sounds, Yodel-Oh is guaranteed to have you yodeling for more.

name: Guards II: Chaos in Hell
description: There is chaos in Hell. Drive a group of heroes through five different underworlds. Survive against tons of evil creatures in amusing turn-based combat to find and face the Devil!

name: Crusader Kings II: Ruler Designer
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Europa Universalis IV Converter
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Customization Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Imperial Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Royal Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Alphaville
description: Build words in a 3D universe of letters in a race against time. Unlock specials as you spell your way through the increasingly challenging levels. Fun for word game fans and action fans alike. Plus, improving your spelling skills is a nice side bonus.

name: Bitcoin Escape
description:
How long can you survive in this digital escape game? You need to have superpowers to do well in this game, because you cannot tell if you are going down a dead end until it’s too late.
Mt Gox has been hacked and now Bitcoins have been scattered across the digital landscape. To contain the extent of the breach, the authorities are quickly moving to turn off mining servers and lock accounts, destroying millions of Bitcoin in the process. It is up to you to gather as much of the loose Bitcoin that you can before it is destroyed, but be warned, the path is full of perilous traps awaiting just one mis-calculation on your part. The future of Bitcoin (and your own personal fortune) is in your hands.

name: Dungeon Restaurant
description:
In the deep dungeons somewhere.. A place where adventurers quench their thirst…
The store hours are from 12 A.M. to 12 P.M... People cal this store the "Dungeon Delicacy". All dishes are made with the monsters that live in this dungeon.
Do customers come? More than you think...

name: Shooting Genius
description: Shooting Genius is an archery game. It is a game that shoots bows to hit apples arranged at different heights. Bombs are also mixed, so you should avoid them and hit the apple. To play the game, tap the screen and pull back to release. It is a game that can continue endlessly.

name: Fingertrainer
description:
Go harder, longer and stronger with the brand new "FingerTrainer" App.
Lift the weights up and down till your muscles scream!

name: Racing in Motor
description:
Third person view perspective, better graphics and real car sounds.Riding motorcycle is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for.
Tilt your device to drag your motor wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new motor. Tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate/brake.

name: Dream Mini Golf: Putt Star
description:
Welcome to one of the craziest game of golf you've ever played. Play your way through some of the most whackiest courses. Get mesmerised in this beautiful work of art.
Each level you come across will be very unique and different from the previous level you played, discover the best way to get a Hole in One. The game features a very simple and easy to play gameplay. All you have to do is Aim and power up your shot and shoot for an eagle, but you will also make sure that you complete each level within the given time. Do you think your game to face the challenge head on beat it. Compete against your friends in our online leaderboards, show the world your the best. The game does not feature any in-app purchases you just need to play smart and unlock all the 5 unique themes

name: Fruit Battle: Survival
description:
Get ready for an addictive and action-packed adventure with "Fruit Battle - Survival"! In this 2D mobile game, you play as a brave strawberry that has been kidnapped and locked in a cage. You have no choice but to fight for your survival by battling one vegetable per day on sugar islands.
Each battle takes place on an island made of sugar blocks that can be destroyed by either you or your enemy. As you destroy the blocks, the island gets smaller and it becomes easier to fall off. Falling off the island means falling into the cave where a worm is waiting with a plate to eat the loser of the game.
To survive the day, you must knock down the vegetable off the island before the vegetable knocks you down. You can use your gun to shoot at the enemy, knocking them back. But that's not all - each character, whether it be the strawberry or the vegetable, has a unique superpower that can be used during the battle. These superpowers are much stronger than getting knocked back by a gun, and they can be the key to your survival!
With each passing day, the battles get harder, and the vegetables become stronger. Can you survive the challenge and become the ultimate Fruit Battle champion? You'll have to rely on your skills, wits, and strategic use of your superpowers to come out on top.
But it's not just about surviving. "Fruit Battle - Survival" features cute and colorful graphics that will keep you entertained for hours on end. The game's fun and quirky characters, from the strawberry to the broccoli, will keep you engaged and entertained as you battle your way through the game.

name: Dungeon Abyss
description:
Dungeon Abyss is a turn based rogue-lite procedural dungeon crawler, in which you can explore various worlds trying to regain the lost light that was stolen, to reestablish the balance and discover your true nature in the process.
Several procedural generated worlds, the game is still in beta, new worlds and features will be added in future releases, thank you for your comprehension and support.
You can also have fun in the creation mode in which you can create your own dungeon, with the resources unlocked while exploring worlds.

name: Golf Odyssey 2
description:
Golf Odyssey 2 is the ultimate relaxing and challenging experience in a golf game.
Don't be fooled by the laid-back soundtrack, the amazing atmosphere or the beautiful pixel art. Golf Odyssey 2 can be that moment of calm and peace to disconnect from your daily stress, or that relentless game where you must perfect your hitting and your play style.
Start your career and complete new and challenging courses to reach the top. Prove your worth and become a real golf king!

name: Monsters Tap Tap Music Battle University
description: Everybody Loves to dance… Even monsters! In this exciting dance game you will play as the craziest, funniest, coolest, fastest, cutest & most awesome monsters you have ever seen.

name: Magnetball Lite
description:
MagnetBall is played by bouncing iron balls straight at red magnets to get points. Each ball falls from above by gravitational force. You must bounce the ball using a steel bar. The bar is controlled by your finger sliding over the iPhone/iPod screen. Control can also be had by using a multi-touch interface. This will give enhanced angle and speed control. If you like a challenge, this is it!
This game has many levels. You must avoid penalties for missed balls to advance. Difficult magnet locations and external forces make successive levels more challenging. Bonuses are awarded for reaching a level without losing any balls.

name: Talk Tac Toe Lite
description:
A cool spin on tic-tac-toe. Each character icon has it’s own catch phrase as you place it on the board. Also have fun uploading your own funny faces with our upload feature.
Talk-Tac-Toe is the most basic of games but with this cool twist it will keep your kids entertained on long car rides and bring friends and family together with and old school game.

name: Turtles, Huh?: Learn to Fly
description:
Turtles, Huh? The game has 1 Main game and 9 Mini-games. The game has 2 characters: Turtle and Penguin. The game has 88 missions and 40 achievements. The game is so much fun that you will find challenging in all the nine games.
Mini-games: The games are designed for the mini-game lovers. You will find challenging in the games. Can you get grade "A"s in all the mini-games?
Main game: 88 missions are waiting for you to complete! Upgrade your equipments, fly as far as possible, Destroy all the obstacles and get all 7 Turtle Balls. Huh? What are the Turtle Balls? The legend said when someone gets all the 7 balls, he will get the power to conquer the world!

name: Mutton for Punishment 3
description: Mutton for Punishment - Endurance gaming just got tasty! The survival of your flock is at stake. Deep in the hills of Wales, you must defend your flock against the vicious wolf. In Mutton for Punishment’s rapid-fire game, you must use your sling shot to protect your flock and destroy the pesky wolfs flaming arrows before they flambé them! Launch the stones from your slingshot at the correct time to destroy the arrows and collect baawsome power-ups.

name: PenguinLinks v2
description: Do you love penguins? Then you got to love this fun puzzle game with cute penguins in costumes, representing all kinds of characters from your daily life: such as Lisa Simpson, Rodger Federer, Super Mario, Judoka player, Hulk, Cartman, incredibles, Viking, ... and many many more. Try this game and see if you can identify each of them!

name: Ball of Woe
description: It's bizarre! It's dark! It's colorful! It's cute! It makes you want to brush your teeth! It's.... Ball of Woe!

name: Red Remover Blast
description:
Red Remover Blast is the explosive spin-off of hit puzzle game Red Remover.
The gameplay is different this time around. Instead of tapping red shapes to remove them you must use explosions to knock them off the screen. Don't knock any green shapes off though or you'll fail the level. To add to the fun there are 8 planes of gravity - look at the shapes faces to see which way they will fall.
Too easy? Try replaying the game in the extra challenging coin mode!

name: CleverMonkey
description:
A new game capsize the traditional game play of casual puzzle genre.
CleverMonkey innovate a series puzzle solving module, on the other word, a brand new game play approach based on the level design of catapult puzzle mechanism.
The sports fans Rebecca foster a clever monkey ,but before she took a field trip she forgot leave food to feed the monkey , therefore ,the monkey enforced to search and get diversity food via his intelligence on his own, WOW what's a smart and comely monkey .
CleverMonkey is a puzzle genre game which comprised variety physical effects , went through catapult methods to fulfill wide spectrum of puzzle solution, as a player, you will experienced significant and tremendous satisfaction and exiting which a puzzle genre possibly can brought, moreover, the 90 omnipresent joyful levels will ultimately challenge your limitation of intelligence .

name: Finger Dash
description:
Addictive Warning...this game is highly addictive!!
5 seconds, 10 seconds or 30 seconds…how long can you last? Keep moving to survive…stop and you’re dead! Sounds simple, doesn’t it? ...Perhaps in the beginning, but things get nasty later on and that’s when you’ve got to put the pedal to the metal!
Finger Dash your way through the chaos of blue blocks and psychedelic environments, protecting your yellow block from colliding with certain destruction!
So what are you waiting for? Download Finger Dash and find out.
But be warned...this game is highly addictive!!

name: Finger Gravity
description:
Want to prove your talent on Hand-brain coordination? Just challenge this game.
In a world without gravity, you will bump into various monsters on your way to destination. Use your fingers as the motor engine and steering wheel, and drive as fast as possible to finish the race. Hi, boy, drift like a racing car!
Aside from simple and stuning game graphics, a variety of challenging stages, brand new challenge modes and diversified mini games are waiting for you!

name: Adventures of JoJo & ToTo
description:
The ultimate educational tool for your child from toddler to elementary school. Learn to read, match, spell, add, subtract, multiply and sharpen their motor skills all in one app!
JoJo and ToTo are two monkeys who love to play with their friends LoLo, DoDo and HoHo. But JoJo has a problem, he doesn't like being a monkey.
Does he become a lion? Or a donkey? Find out!
There are two versions of the story; a "big kid" story for elementary school kids and a "little kid" story for toddlers and pre-schoolers.
Your child will learn to believe in themselves as JoJo learns and experiences how other animals live.

name: Juggling BBQ HD
description:
You have sliced fruits, now it’s time to skewer and make the perfect BBQ !
Juggling BBQ is a fast and funny action game for everyone to enjoy ! Pin some food pieces with dexterity while flying in the air to become the ultimate skewer chef master !

name: Wipeout Dash 2
description: Wipeout Dash 2 steps up the challenge with its brand new “swipe control” system to take on all new physics puzzles! Millions of gamers around the globe took on the challenges that the original Wipeout Dash had to offer but we ask … “Are you ready for more?” Wipeout Dash 2 has all new levels with all new challenges for you to come out swiping in all directions to see if you can be the ball … or Wipeout!

name: Fix the Leaks
description:
Help tiny critters fix the yummy jelly leaks!
Once upon a time, a scientist created a machine to make jelly. But once the machine was built, there was an explosion and now a strange goo is pouring into the whole house. Luckily for him, his experimental creatures turned out to love the taste, and thus he discovered a solution...

name: Bubble Box: 6 In 1
description: When you see your screen is full of bubbles, can you keep your fingers from tapping them? Enjoy the fun of popping bubbles and compete with world wide players for top score.

name: Max Awesome
description: Take it to the max and become a daredevil legend. Learn to wheelie, jump, duck, and flip then put your skills to the test through 60 perilous courses. Complete over 100 objectives, buy and unlock new skills, and challenge your Facebook friends to top your record scores.

name: BeaverKarts
description: Show who’s the coolest Beaver in the whole valley by doing awesome tricks & flips. Beat your friends’ high score in weekly tournaments and challenge them through Facebook!

name: Worrrm Rebirth
description:
Keep escaping from the expanding and contracting worm.
You can move the character by tilting the device (mobile phone). When entering a round stage, points will be added. Compete how much points you can overlap without being caught by the worm.

name: Dream Gym
description: Build your own gym from scratch and get an enjoyable experience of making it grow into a huge fitness hall full of happy customers. Be your own boss, trainer, manager and decor stylist. Give your clients the right work-out and get paid for that. Watch your characters' body shape change advancing level by level.

name: Cyclopong
description:
Platform with 3 ping pong rackets rotates.
Tap on the screen to flip rotation direction and bounce the ball around. Bounce it as long as you can!
Longer you keep bouncing it, better score you get.

name: Elephant Rampage
description: Man will Regret for Killing Elephants just for their tusk which brought elephants on the edge of extinction.

Fresh and unique numbers merged gameplay.
Not only 1900, but more than 2048! Kidding...This is harder...Very more harder...
Can you merge number bigger than 2048? Or bigger than 1900?Or bigger than 1010?
Nope...Merge number bigger than 190 can be genius in 1900!

name: Hoppy Frog
description:
Jump from cloud to cloud, collecting gold flies along the way. Tap in the air to open Hoppy's parachute and clear longer distances. Beware of jumping Electric Eels and the hungry 'Sharky' in the waters below!
Hoppy Frog is the latest all-new addictive game for iOS featuring fast paced platform action and chiptune soundtrack by '8 Bit Weapon'.

name: Pretty Bubble: Flappy Adventures
description: In Endless underwater world, very cute hero is trying to pass the obstacles. You join this adventure.

name: Hex-Mix
description: Hex-Mix is based on color matching and hand-eye coordination mixed with cognitive enhancing mechanics, this game is perfect for young players!

name: Safari Toy Factory
description: When being a child, everyone dreams of having a small elephant or lion, to be his best friend, to take care of him. You decide to go to the jungle to the toys producing factory . You have to prove that you can create jungle toys, collect and pack the toys into their boxes for sale.

name: Color Dots
description: A serene landscape of color and zen - but only if you meditate and focus can you pass!

name: Shot Shot Shoot
description:
This game is catering to the iPad's unique strengths as a beautiful social gaming platform of the future. Shot Shot Shoot is part of a new way of playing games with your friends, combining the magic of computers with the special interactions made possible by board games.
The goal of the game is simple: destroy the five squares on the opponent's side of the board. Maneuver single shots with high precision or overwhelm the other player with massive attack waves – a fun mixture of fast-paced gameplay and deep strategy!

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - NES Demake
